Name: Amazon Italia
Company description: Amazon Italia is a subsidiary of the global e-commerce giant Amazon, dedicated to providing a comprehensive range of products and services to customers throughout Italy. The company operates an extensive online marketplace that features a diverse selection of items, including books, electronics, household goods, and fashion, catering to a wide array of clients such as individual consumers, small businesses, and large enterprises. Amazon Italia's mission is to be Earth's most customer-centric company, ensuring that customers can find and discover anything they might want to buy online.  The company emphasizes enhancing the shopping experience through personalized advertising and tailored recommendations based on user behavior, which is facilitated by the use of cookies. Amazon Italia partners with various sellers, including local small businesses, to enrich its product offerings and support the Italian economy. Additionally, the company provides solutions like Amazon Business and services for independent authors, further broadening its appeal to different market segments. With a strong commitment to customer satisfaction, Amazon Italia focuses on delivering fast delivery options and a seamless shopping experience, making it a preferred choice for online shoppers in the region. The company's vision revolves around continuous innovation and improving the shopping experience, ensuring that it meets the evolving needs of its target market. Through programs like Amazon Associates and Fulfilment by Amazon, the company facilitates the sale and distribution of products, reinforcing its role as a key player in the Italian e-commerce landscape. Furthermore, Amazon Italia is dedicated to promoting sustainable practices and community engagement, aligning its operations with broader social and environmental goals.

Company description: Miele Italia è una filiale del prestigioso marchio tedesco Miele, specializzata nella produzione e distribuzione di elettrodomestici di alta gamma, con un focus particolare sulle macchine per il caffè. L'azienda si distingue per l'impegno a offrire prodotti che uniscono innovazione, qualità e design, garantendo un'esperienza d'uso eccezionale per i propri clienti. La missione di Miele è quella di migliorare la vita quotidiana dei consumatori, fornendo elettrodomestici che non solo soddisfano le esigenze pratiche, ma che elevano anche il piacere della vita domestica. Miele Italia si rivolge a una clientela diversificata, che include sia consumatori privati che professionisti del settore, come ristoranti e caffetterie, in cerca di soluzioni di caffè premium.  L'azienda collabora con una rete di partner commerciali, che va dai rivenditori autorizzati ai centri di esperienza Miele, per garantire una distribuzione efficace e un servizio clienti di alta qualità. Miele Italia si distingue per la sua attenzione al servizio clienti, offrendo opzioni di finanziamento flessibili, come piani di pagamento senza interessi, e servizi di consegna e installazione gratuiti, per un'esperienza di acquisto senza soluzione di continuità. Le macchine per il caffè di Miele sono progettate per soddisfare le diverse preferenze degli appassionati di caffè, con caratteristiche innovative come la pulizia automatica, le impostazioni personalizzabili delle bevande e interfacce user-friendly. Con un forte focus sulla qualità e sulla durabilità, Miele Italia si impegna a mantenere la sua reputazione di eccellenza nel settore degli elettrodomestici, offrendo prodotti che garantiscono prestazioni eccezionali e un design elegante.

Company description: MD SpA is a leading manufacturer specializing in the design and production of high-quality household appliances, with a particular focus on refrigeration solutions, including refrigerators and freezers. The company is dedicated to enhancing the user experience through innovative, energy-efficient products that prioritize safety and convenience. MD SpA's mission is to provide reliable and user-friendly appliances that cater to the diverse needs of both residential and commercial clients, ensuring food safety and freshness. The company serves a wide range of customers, including individual households, hotels, restaurants, and catering businesses, positioning itself as a trusted name in the appliance sector. With a strong commitment to sustainability, MD SpA aims to minimize environmental impact while delivering cutting-edge technology and superior performance. The company collaborates with various partners in the appliance industry to maintain high standards of quality and innovation, ensuring that its products not only meet but exceed market expectations. MD SpA's target market includes consumers seeking modern, efficient refrigeration solutions that align with contemporary lifestyles and sustainability goals. The company's vision is to continuously improve its product offerings while focusing on energy efficiency and user-friendly designs, contributing to a healthier lifestyle and a sustainable planet. By prioritizing customer satisfaction and environmental responsibility, MD SpA is dedicated to advancing refrigeration technology and revolutionizing the way people approach food preservation and storage.

Company description: De’ Longhi is one of the world’s leading players in the household appliance sector and is mainly active in the coffee and food preparation segments, which represent around 80% of the Group’s total revenues. The Group’s brand portfolio includes:  ·       De’ Longhi, the historic brand born in 1974 and world leader in coffee machines for domestic use;  ·       Kenwood, British brand acquired in 2001 and among the world leaders in the food preparation sector;  ·       Braun, the German brand, under perpetual licence since 2012, in the kitchen and domestic appliance segments;  ·       Nutribullet, American brand acquired in 2020 and world leader in the personal blenders segment;  ·       Ariete, acquired together with Kenwood in 2001, it offers innovative solutions in the cooking, ironing and cleaning sectors.  Listed on the Borsa Italiana’s main stock market, MTA, since 2001, De’ Longhi distributes its products in more than 120 markets worldwide and employs over 10,000 people. In 2021, the Group generated revenues of €3,222 million, an adjusted EBITDA of €515 million and a net profit of €311 million. Espresso coffee machines for domestic use are the core of the Group's strategy, since they account for about 50% of total turnover. This market is worth close to €4 billion, is continually expanding and the De' Longhi brand is a global leader in it.  The Group’s activities are highly diversified geographically, with direct commercial presence in Europe, North America, Middle East, Africa and Asia/Pacific. From an industrial perspective, De’ Longhi can count on 6 production sites located in Italy (1), Romania (3) and China (2), plus a facility in a joint venture with the TCL Group in China.  The company is led by Giuseppe de' Longhi (Chairman), Fabio de' Longhi (CEO and Vice-Chairman), and Nicola Serafin (General Manager).

Company description: Founded in 1923, De Nora is an Italian multinational company listed on the Euronext Milan stock exchange, specializing in electrochemistry, a leader in sustainable technologies, and has a vital role in the industrial green hydrogen production chain. The Company has a portfolio of products and systems to optimize the energy efficiency of critical industrial electrochemical processes and a range of products and solutions for water treatment. Globally, De Nora is the world's largest supplier of activated electrodes (serving a broad portfolio of customers operating in chlorine & caustic soda production, components for electronics, and non-ferrous metal refining). De Nora is also among the world's leading suppliers of water filtration and disinfection technologies (for the industrial, municipal, and marine sectors) and swimming pool disinfection components. Leveraging its well-established electrochemical knowledge, proven manufacturing capability, and a supply chain established over the years, the Company has developed and qualified a portfolio of electrodes and components to produce hydrogen through the electrolysis of water, which is critical for the energy transition. De Nora has 25 operating companies in 10 countries and 5 R&D centers in Italy, the United States, and Japan, which ensure the continuous improvement and enlargement of its proprietary technologies covered by over 260 patent families with more than 2,800 territorial extensions. With its widespread presence and broad product portfolio, the Company can effectively serve customers in 100 countries, employing more than 1,900 people worldwide. OUR VISION: Leverage available talents as catalysts for a sustainable future. OUR MISSION: Agility & green technologies for value creation.

Company description: Elica, present in the market for over 50 years, is the global leader in the kitchen extraction systems market, thanks to the production of kitchen hoods and extractor hobs. It is also a leading European manufacturer of electric motors for household appliances and boilers. Chaired by Francesco Casoli and led by Giulio Cocci, with about 3,000 employees, Elica holds an industrial platform consisting in seven factories based in Italy, Poland, Mexico and China. Great attention to design, refined materials and state-of-the-art technologies, guaranteeing maximum efficiency and reduced energy consumption, are the reasons why Elica Group stands out in the reference market. Thanks to these key factors, Elica has also been able to revolutionize the traditional image of the kitchen hood: not just simple accessories, but unique design objects capable of improving the quality of life.

Company description: With 55 years of experience in the field, SIT can provide complete power transmission solutions. SIT manufactures a full range of power transmission components, including timing pulleys, V-pulleys, couplings, sprockets and many other accessories. It also distributes leading brands of power transmission belts, bearing units, modular belts, planetary gearboxes and electronic devices. Through its sister company Elatech Srl, SIT manufactures a full line of polyurethane belts for power transmission, conveying and lifting applications. Con 55 anni di esperienza nel settore, SIT è in grado di fornire soluzioni complete per la trasmissione di potenza. SIT produce una vasta gamma di componenti per la trasmissione del moto, tra cui pulegge dentate, pulegge trapezoidali, giunti di trasmissione, pignoni per catena e molti altri accessori. Distribuisce anche marchi leader di cinghie di trasmissione, supporti auto-allineanti, cinghie modulari, riduttori epicicloidali e dispositivi per la regolazione della trasmissione. Attraverso la sua consociata Elatech Srl, SIT produce una vasta gamma di cinghie in poliuretano per applicazioni di trasmissione di potenza, trasporto e sollevamento.

Company description: Fin dalla sua fondazione, nel 1984, C.E. ha sempre voluto dire Apple. A Milano siamo i più vecchi. Abbiamo cominciato a credere nella rivoluzione della nostra epoca prima degli altri, tra i primi in tutta Italia. Abbiamo più di vent'anni di esperienza sul campo e possiamo vantarci di conoscere bene il nostro lavoro di esperti in Macintosh, un lavoro svolto soprattutto con passione e professionalità. Presso la nostra sede in via Marcantonio dal Re 26 o negli show-room di piazza Firenze 4 e corso San Gottardo 5 a Milano, via Vittorio Emanuele 8 a Monza e piazza XX Settembre 1/2 a Varese e da settembre a Novara. Troverete esattamente ciò che vi serve: computer e applicazioni, periferiche e accessori, la consulenza e il know how, l'utile e il dilettevole a un tempo, per dare nuove forme al vostro business e rinnovata energia ai vostri progetti. Vendiamo l'hardware e il software più sofisticati sempre al passo con le ultime novità in termini di efficienza e velocità: un mondo intero che conosciamo da più di vent'anni e che cambia ogni giorno vertiginosamente. Per questo, nel tempo, ci siamo rinnovati ed evoluti: diventando un centro di assistenza autorizzato Apple: occupandoci dello sviluppo software; viaggiando in parallelo con l'evoluzione dell'editoria, della grafica e dell' Audio Video da facendo conoscere ed apprezzare i computer e i software Apple nel mondo della scuola; crescendo insieme ad Internet; accompagnando i nostri utenti nel passaggio al video e all'audio digitale.

Company description: SHIBAURA MACHINE EUROPE was established in 2019 in Italy as a subsidiary of Shibaura Machine Japan, in order to enhance sales and service support functions in the European markets. With excellent access to European countries, we have been enhancing sales and technical support to our sales partners and actively developing new markets, thereby improving our presence.  Shibaura Machine (FKA Toshiba Machine) is a leading global manufacturer of injection molding machines, die casting machines, machine tools, nano processing systems, industrial robots and extrusion machines. The engineering origins of Shibaura Machine can be traced back more than a century to Shibaura Engineering Works, established in 1875. Through the many subsequent decades, we have continued to grow and evolve, through challenge and adversity, into a premier global manufacturer of a wide variety of innovative, precise, supremely reliable machinery. Shibaura Machine was among the first companies in the world to establish mechatronics-oriented production systems. Continuous research and development – always searching for a better way – has enabled us to take advantage of our own advanced precision technologies and sophisticated electronics experience and use them to improve the machines we build for our customers. It is the continuity we have achieved over generations of accumulated skill and knowledge, our ability to build upon the shoulders of those who preceded, which makes us special. At our state-of-the-art manufacturing facilities in Japan, as well as more recent globally integrated facilities in China, India and Thailand, we produce all of the components to yield the superb precision and impressive infrastructure of our machines – from small factory automation equipment to machinery of truly mammoth proportions. As our company’s odyssey continues, as we continue to work with our customers to co-create greater value, we will continue “to strive, to seek, to find, and not to yield”.

Company description: CMC Packaging Automation, headquartered in Città di Castello, Italy, is a leading provider of innovative, fully automated packaging solutions specifically designed for the e-commerce and logistics sectors. Established in 1980, the company has positioned itself as a pioneer in rightsized packaging technology, significantly enhancing operational efficiency while minimizing environmental impact. CMC's mission is to revolutionize the packaging industry by delivering sustainable solutions that cater to the evolving demands of its diverse clientele, which includes retailers, logistics companies, and e-commerce platforms across various sectors such as fashion, electronics, and food. The company is dedicated to sustainability, with a goal of achieving net-zero carbon emissions by 2050. CMC actively collaborates with partners like Mondi and Antalis to develop eco-friendly packaging solutions, reflecting its commitment to reducing waste and optimizing shipping processes. Notable products, such as the CMC PaperPro system and CMC CartonWrap, exemplify the company's dedication to enhancing the customer experience while addressing the growing demand for sustainable practices in packaging. Serving over 500 clients across 25 countries, CMC has installed approximately 3,000 systems worldwide over the past 40 years, making it a global leader in sustainable, fully automated packaging solutions. The company has established strong partnerships with organizations like KKR Global Impact and Amazon's Climate Pledge Fund, which support the development of eco-friendly technologies. CMC empowers its clients with tools like the "My Impact Calculator" to assess and improve their environmental impact, while also focusing on social responsibility and robust governance practices to foster long-term relationships and trust. With a clear vision for the future, CMC Packaging Automation aims to lead the industry in creating sustainable, efficient packaging solutions that meet the evolving demands of the global market, while fostering an ownership culture among its employees to recognize their vital role in the company's success and growth.

Company description: ELECTRONICAL SPECIALIST RETAIL (G.d.S.) - Euronics è un gruppo europeo di grande distribuzione specializzato nell'elettronica con sede internazionale ad Amsterdam. I membri di Euronics sono tutti rivenditori indipendenti. Conta 11.500 negozi in 28 nazioni europee con un fatturato espresso pari a €14,1 miliardi (dicembre 2009). Euronics Italia S.p.A. rappresenta il secondo socio per fatturato di Euronics International, secondo solo alla Germania. È uno dei gruppi leader nella distribuzione di elettrodomestici ed elettronica di consumo, nato nel 1999 dall’evoluzione dello storico marchio GET. In Italia, Euronics è un gruppo formato da 25 Soci distribuiti sull'intero territorio nazionale, che comprende complessivamente 625 punti vendita (dicembre 2010), l'organico complessivo ammonta ad oltre 5.000 collaboratori.

Company description: Marsilli S.p.A. is a leading global provider of advanced automation solutions, specializing in the design, construction, and installation of winding and assembly systems for coils and motors. Established in 1938, the company boasts over 80 years of experience and has positioned itself as a key player in industrial automation, serving a diverse range of industries including automotive, appliances, electromechanical applications, RFID technology, and consumer electronics. Marsilli's mission is to deliver high-quality, technologically advanced products that meet the evolving needs of its clients while promoting sustainable development and fostering shared value among stakeholders. The company emphasizes innovation, quality, and customer satisfaction, ensuring that its solutions are tailored to enhance operational efficiency and reliability. With a significant export orientation, Marsilli has established a robust presence in key markets such as Germany, North America, China, and France, collaborating with multinational corporations to provide customized solutions. The company operates from a substantial facility of 40,000 square meters, enabling the development of increasingly complex systems. Marsilli is committed to ethical practices, environmental responsibility, and social inclusion, aligning its operations with environmental, social, and governance (ESG) principles. The company values its employees as strategic assets, fostering a culture of participation and collaboration that enhances individual autonomy and creativity. Marsilli actively engages with local communities and educational institutions, promoting talent development and supporting social, artistic, and environmental charities. The company collaborates with over 2,100 suppliers, predominantly from local markets, to ensure high standards of quality and compliance with ESG criteria. Marsilli's vision focuses on continuous innovation and improvement in technology, aiming to integrate sustainability into its core operations while maintaining a strong commitment to employee well-being and professional growth. Through its initiatives, Marsilli strives to create a positive impact on both the market and the community, reinforcing its position as a leader in the automation solutions industry.

Company description: Keyline is a family-owned business at the forefront of technology and innovation in the security industry. The company is a leading manufacturer of keys, key cutting machines, transponders and smart access solutions. The headquarters is in Conegliano Veneto and with its 9 subsidiaries across 3 continents has a presence in approximately 70 countries. Employing about 160 team members globally, of which 15% are engineers, designers and programmers with extensive expertise in electronics and mechanics that constitute the company's real crown jewel: the Research and Development team. Strongly connected with the culture of the territory, the entire Keyline production chain is based in Veneto, where its professional expertise in the key sector guarantees its successful and ongoing operation in a global context in which technological evolution is increasingly dynamic, presenting new products and new service solutions, to meet the needs of every client. The Bianchi 1770 Group As part of the Group, Keyline has inherited centuries of knowledge and expertise in the key industry, passed down through the Bianchi family since 1770 when master locksmith Matteo Bianchi created the first forged iron keys in Cibiana di Cadore. With over 250 years of experience behind them, the Bianchi family, and thus Keyline, have established themselves as a major industry leader, withstanding the test of time with the continuous development of new, innovative, and high-quality products.

Company description: CEMB is a leading company in balancing and vibration analysis field.  CEMB’s core business incorporates all industrial applications inherent to vibration analysis: the Industrial Equipment Division of CEMB develops, manufactures and exports worldwide a range of vertical axis and horizontal axis balancing machines, produces fully automated high-tech machines specifically dedicated to assembly-lines of automotive manufacturers; this latter field is in continuous growth thanks to the contribution of our Hofmann sister company located in Germany. The Garage Equipment Division handles wheel balancing machines, tire changers and alignments for cars, trucks and motorcycles. The Instrumentation Division manufactures vibration sensors, stationary and portable equipment for vibration measurement and analysis, balancing in service conditions, 24h monitoring and control of vibration to protect large machinery in the energy and industrial plant fields such as gas turbines, compressor pumps and motors. Since 1946 the headquarters have always been located in Italy, at Mandello del Lario, on the eastern shore of Lake Como. Over the years the production facilities and R&D departments have extended and modernized, in connection with the company growth and substantial investments to preserve both heart and style in Italy.

Company description: DIERRE S.p.A. designs and manufactures technologically advanced protections and components with high aesthetic impact for industrial automation in the most different sectors, from food&beverage to ceramics, from automotive to pharma, from nautical to electronics. Experience, creativity and innovation have allowed it to become a leader in this sector with safety guards for automatic machines, made of aluminum or steel, handling systems and industrial robotics systems; main products are structural aluminum profiles, perimeter and modular protection guards, linear modules, conveyor systems,  Cartesian, collaborative and arm robots and industrial soundproofing projects. The company was founded in Spezzano in 1997 and from that location has become a Group of 11 manufacturing companies located in the Italian regions with the highest industrial settlement: Emilia Romagna, Lombardy, Veneto, Tuscany Dierre brand products are marketed in Italy and worldwide, both with direct and reflex supplies, through the export of Italian and foreign customers.

Company description: Bertolotto Porte SpA is an Italian company that is one of the world leaders in the design, manufacture and marketing of interior doors. They are produced in both classic and modern styles and feature environmentally-friendly high-tech designs that provide high levels of quality, and durability over time. A high-tech production area of 50,000 square meters as well as outsourcing and joint ventures. Annual production capacity of 250,000 doors - 1,000 doors per day - covering a wide area of Italian/Abroad market. Depth of range: 16 collections for over 38,000 models of doors, 35 woods and 78 standard colours. All our customers are very important people and our daily energies are all focused on providing them with a superior quality product at an affordable price. We pay the utmost attention to our customers’ expectations: they dream, plan and imagine their homes where they invest their time and resources. We are very proud to be a part of those dreams. For us a client is a person who allows us to create new jobs, innovate and invest all our resources on a daily basis so that we can improve our brand and spread it throughout the world. For us doors are not just objects, they are rather “made-to-measure ” one-off creations that will perfectly fit our customers’ houses and will reach out almost the perfection.  We are honored to have a Made in Italy brand that concerns all the components, from raw materials to design and manufacturing: our product is entirely designed and manufactured in Italy. Original Bertolotto doors are the synthesis of the way we work and why we are successful. All of this thanks to the fact that customers trust us and they are more than 1.5 million households located in over 40 countries throughout the world.

Company description: Born in 1976 from the vision and the enthusiasm of who used to breath, every day, the culture of hight quality furniture. In the manufacturing sites, from the district of excellence located in the Noth-East of Italy, skilled workmen control the last most updated generation of CNC Machines. The heart of Armony's design: aesthetic, elegance and experience, stay for reliable products, new images for future kitchens but remaining a still conscious witness of past traditions. — Armony nasce nel 1976, dall'immaginazione e dall'entusiasmo proprio di chi ogni giorno respira la cultura del mobile di qualità. Nei due stabilimenti produttivi del distretto del mobile d’eccellenza nel Nord Est d'Italia, le mani esperte dei professionisti del mobile guidano l’ultima generazione di macchine a controllo numerico. Estetica, eleganza ed esperienza sono il cuore di design Armony: nascono così prodotti affidabili, volti nuovi della cucina del domani, ma consapevoli testimoni di tradizioni antiche. —— Armony est née en 1976, de l’imagination et de l’enthousiasme de ceux qui respirent chaque jour la culture du mobilier de qualité. Dans les deux usines de production à Caneva (PN) et à Mansuè (TV), les mains expertes des professionnels de l’ameublement guident la dernière génération de machines à commande numérique. Esthétique, élégance et expérience sont au cœur du design Armony: ainsi naissent des produits fiables, de nouveaux visages de la cuisine de demain, mais tenant compte des traditions antiques.

Company description: IAMET Srl was established in September 2015 with the aim of catching opportunities for acquisitions of metal stamping companies. In April 2016 IAMET acquires the historical and qualified SIAC company. Producer of small metal parts since 1921 in the factory of Cavaria con Premezzo (VA), with a pregressive orientation towards components on customers drawing, particularly for the automotive sector: today it is recognized as one of the leading company in its field. In October 2017 IAMET acquires the historic and qualified Capica company. Producer of metal accessories since 1956 in the plant of Albignasego (PD), the company has progressively oriented towards the production of metal accessories based on customer design for the footwear, leather goods and clothing sectors. In October 2017 IAMET acquires the historic and qualified company Castiglioni Giovanni Spa, which markets and manufactures small metal parts since 1960. The business, recently moved to the factory of Cavaria con Premezzo, has progressively specialized in the marketing of small metal parts standards for wholesalers, artisans and retail sales. THE IAMET CORE BUSINESS: Production of precision small metal parts by cold stamping from metal strips and surface treatment through galvanic process.  IAMET TODAY MEANS: - Two plants: Cavaria con Premezzo (VA) and Albignasego (PD) - About 280 employees - Over 50,000 products for the various sectors: the automobile; electronics; of high fashion accessories; of leather goods; clothing; of the paper industry.  OUR POINTS OF EXCELLENCE: - Co-design of the product together with the customer - Rapid prototyping capacity, thanks to the internal mold departments - Constant attention to quality, as also attested by the numerous quality certifications - Internal assembly of products - Design and construction of special machines that allow the customer to apply small parts directly on fashion accessories and other - Internal departments for surface treatment of products

Company description: SAIM S.p.A. is a prominent Italian company founded in 1951, specializing in the import and distribution of high-quality components and accessories for the marine and industrial sectors. With a strong commitment to innovation and sustainability, SAIM has established itself as a trusted partner for renowned manufacturers, offering advanced solutions such as marine propulsion systems, hybrid engines, and stabilization technologies. The company operates through three main business units: SAIM Marine, SAIM Industrial, and SAIM Engineering, catering to a diverse clientele that includes prestigious shipyards, yacht builders, commercial shipping companies, and marine service providers across Europe and the Mediterranean region. SAIM's mission is to enhance operational efficiency and sustainability through cutting-edge technology, while its vision emphasizes the importance of environmental and social responsibility. The company has recently published its first Sustainability Report and achieved Gender Equality certification, reflecting its dedication to sustainable practices. With a robust dealer network of over 150 partners and a global presence, SAIM ensures comprehensive service and support for its customers, from equipment selection to post-sale assistance. The company's product portfolio includes advanced marine equipment such as hydraulic winches, electric thrusters, underwater lighting systems, and monitoring technologies, all designed to meet the rigorous demands of the marine environment. Collaborating with industry leaders like ZF Marine Electronics and Kohler, SAIM aims to deliver reliable and efficient solutions that enhance the safety and performance of marine operations. Through continuous research and development, SAIM S.p.A. strives to lead the marine industry towards greener propulsion solutions, ensuring customer satisfaction and operational excellence while contributing positively to the economy and ecosystem.

Company description: Haier A/C Italy con sede a Revine Lago (TV) è la divisione HAIER per la climatizzazione in Italia. Per essere più vicini alle esigenze dei clienti siamo presenti su tutto il territorio nazionale con 4 logistiche periferiche per garantire un servizio di consegna veloce e tempestivo.  L’attività aziendale di promozione e vendita del prodotto è supportata sul territorio da una strutturata e capillare attività di rappresentanza con 37 agenzie. I servizi di assistenza, consulenza e post- vendita sono affidati a 360 Centri qualificati e in costante aggiornamento tecnico.  Il nostro approccio “Zero Distance” ci permette di fornire ai clienti dei prodotti che li aiutino a fronteggiare le esigenze della quotidianità. È con questa filosofia che riusciamo a sviluppare la nostra gamma di prodotti e assicurarci che seguano i ritmi della casa moderna. Dal 2015, siamo anche presenti a Milano con un ufficio dedicato al volume variabile.

Company description: Virosac è l’azienda leader in Italia nella produzione di prodotti per la casa, in particolare sacchi per i rifiuti e sacchi per la congelazione degli alimenti. Nata 50 anni fa, impiega oggi più di 100 dipendenti che lavorano in Italia, in due stabilimenti a Pederobba (TV). Qui attraverso strumentazioni d’avanguardia vengono lavorate ogni anno 8.000 tonnellate di materiale e prodotti 600 milioni di sacchetti.  Se alla nascita erano soprattutto i sacchi frigo, la produzione di Virosac si è poi notevolmente allargata arrivando a comprendere ogni tipo di sacco per i rifiuti (dal piccolo sacco in Mater-Bi per il rifiuto umido fino ai grandi sacchi ultraresistenti per il rifiuto secco del condominio) e tantissime soluzioni diverse per la cucina, il guardaroba, il giardino.  Ma la peculiarità di Virosac è la capacità di creare prodotti nuovi: è il caso ad esempio del sistema brevettato Lacciosac per la chiusura più pratica dei sacchetti, la saldatura antigoccia che evita le rotture, lo Stopsac oltre al Saccofrigo con laccetto già incorporato nel sacco.  Tema importante per Virosac è quello della tutela dell’ambiente: è stata tra le prime aziende in Italia ad ottimizzare l’utilizzo di plastiche rigenerate o materiali biodegradabili e cerca di ridurre al minimo gli imballi dei suoi prodotti.

Company description: Manufacturers around the world choose Faccin Group for their most challenging fabrication needs. Over 60 years in the field of metal forming, three leading brands and more than 30.000 machines successfully installed. Faccin Group designs, builds, and implement reliable metal forming solutions for all kinds of sectors such as the shipbuilding, wind, transportation (truck and railway tanks), food, chemical, pressure vessels and heat exchangers just to name some. Its team of engineers allows the Group to take on incredible challenges and to provide unique custom-tailored solutions when needed.  Faccin Group’s three signature brands, FACCIN, BOLDRINI and ROUNDO, offer the widest selection of plate and angle rolls, dished head lines and integrated solutions.  Our wide selection of high-quality solutions include: PLATE ROLLS 2-roll, 3-roll and 4-roll plate bending machines from thin to heavier sheet metal bending with thicknesses of less than 1mm to over 300mm with useful working lengths exceeding 18 meters.  ANGLE ROLLS 3 or 4-roll profile bending machines are available. Ideal to bend steel bars, tubes, pipes, and profiles with bending capacities of up to 18000cm3. DISHED HEAD LINES Automatic dishing presses with manipulators and flanging machines with capacities from 2mm to over 80mm in heads thickness in cold forming and up to 100mm in hot forming and a diameter of up to 12000mm. INTEGRATED SOLUTIONS Onshore and offshore wind tower plate rolling systems, sturdy bending rolls for foundation manufacturing (tripods, jackets, monopiles and TP), ships frame roll presses, large bending rolls for shipbuilding and aerospace industry and special machines. Additionally, to increase production capacity the group provides strong, fast and easy to use: •	Siemens computer numerical controls •	Innovative accessories •	Energy-efficient solutions Contact the Metal Forming Experts at info@faccingroup.com https://www.faccingroup.com https://www.youtube.com/faccingroup

Company description: HITEMA INTERNATIONAL is a specialist manufacturer of Standard and Customized cooling solutions.  With more than 35 years of experience and expertise in the field of cooling solutions and industrial cooling refrigeration, we are structured to follow and help our Customers in every phase of the project: from the design of the project, to the development of the same, up to the production and after-sales assistance thanks to our renewed spare parts service and dedicated after-sales assistance.  Our complete range of products – Process Chillers, Industrial Chillers, Propane Chillers, Turbocor Chillers, Free Cooling Chillers, Multi Scroll Chillers, Inverter Driven Screw Chillers, Water Cooled Chillers, Condenserless Chillers, Reversable Heat Pumps – is designed to satisfy all possible Customers requests, both Standard and Tailor Made solutions, ensuring the best reliability and high quality, while maintaining the optimal efficiency using the latest technologies.  Our References include the following fields of application: Air Conditioning Chillers, Machine Tools Chillers, Plastics & Rubber, Chemical & Pharmaceutical Chiller, Food & Beverage Chiller, Agriculture & Farming, Biogas Chiller, Laser Chiller, Automotive and Data Center Chillers, Wine Chiller, Oil & Gas Chiller.  Production with Eco-Friendly Refrigerants such as R1234ze, R454B, R32, R513A, R290 and Atex Units are now available.  In addition we are proud to announce the launch of the new HITEMA Chiller Rental Line.  Our efforts and investments now position us in the panorama of well-known high tech high quality suppliers in the world of refrigeration - we are worthy competitors of companies such as Trane, Hiref, Artic Chiller, MTA Chiller, Euroklimat, GreenBox, Bluebox Swegon, Frascold, Piovan, Frigel, Aermec, and Vertiv.  Among our close-knit partners, we boast an annual relationship with Bitzer and Frascold. Don't know us yet? Contact us for more information: customer.care@hitema.it VISIT www.hitema.com

Company description: Microtech è l’unica impresa di tecnologia nazionale che disegna, progetta e realizza come OEM / ODM i dispositivi più innovativi e versatili.  Attualmente siamo in grado di progettare e realizzare i dispositivi high-tech più moderni, dai tablet fino ai 2in1, passando per i mini-pc fino agli OPS, basati su architettura Intel, AMD, UniSoc, Mediatek, Allwinner e Qualcomm.  Microtech immagina e concepisce innovazioni che semplificano le vite per sviluppare al meglio le nostre potenzialità, credendo in una tecnologia al servizio dell’uomo e strumenti in grado di interconnettere le persone ovunque ed in ogni momento.  Contiamo su un engineering team competente ed appassionato, che aspira a realizzare prodotti e servizi unici. Continuiamo ad investire in ricerca e sviluppo per aggiungere valore ai nostri prodotti, consapevoli che la qualità industriale e dei rigorosi processi di controllo della stessa rappresentano un nostro prezioso mantra. Guardiamo al futuro come ad una sfida ed ogni persona in Microtech lavora per conseguire il medesimo risultato: offrire qualità e design italiano, un modello di libera scelta del sistema operativo, tecnologia semplificata ed innovazione continua al servizio delle persone.

Company description: La storia di BTB Transfer è storia recente. La società è nata nel 1987 nell’area più produttiva nel campo della rubinetteria Bresciana. Grazie ad un esperienza ventennale nel settore, fin dall’inizio l'obbiettivo è stato quello di avvicinarci al cliente dando ciò che il mercato chiede e non quello che il costruttore produce. “Essere primi è un obiettivo ed una sfida continua. " E’ in questo atteggiamento, nella capacità di metterci in discussione continuamente che troviamo la voglia di perseguire  l’eccellenza in ciò che facciamo, per procedere sempre verso nuovi traguardi. Siamo sempre aperti alle esigenze del mercato creando soluzioni a misura del mercato e pronti ad accettare nuove sfide investendo in ricerca e sviluppo I settori in cui opera l’azienda sono numerosi, spaziamo ormai da anni su tutti i settori dove alta tecnologia e alta produzione vanno di pari passo: - automotive - petrolchimico - raccorderia e valvolame per usi domestici ed industriali - riscaldamento e refrigerazione - oleodinamica e componentistica per l’alta pressione - maniglieria, cerniere, serrature, chiavi e così via..

Company description: QVC Italia is a prominent retail company that specializes in providing a curated selection of high-quality products across various categories, including beauty, home, kitchen, electronics, and fashion. The company is dedicated to the joy of discovering both Italian and international brands, often launching exclusive products through its channels. QVC Italia's mission emphasizes inclusivity and diversity, as evidenced by its commitment to social responsibility initiatives, such as supporting the LGBTQIA+ community and promoting cultural change through campaigns like "La cultura delle diversità."  The company targets a diverse clientele, ranging from young adults to fashion and beauty enthusiasts, and partners with reputable brands to ensure a wide array of quality offerings. By combining the convenience of online shopping with live product presentations, QVC Italia creates a unique and personalized shopping experience that fosters a direct connection with its customers. This innovative approach to retail not only enhances customer engagement but also inspires a more equitable and inclusive shopping environment for all. QVC Italia is also committed to sustainability and social responsibility, encouraging its customers to make conscious and quality choices. Through its diverse product range and strong brand partnerships, the company aims to inspire customers to explore new trends while celebrating the rich heritage of Italian design. Overall, QVC Italia stands out as a leader in the retail space, dedicated to delivering exceptional value and fostering a sense of community among its shoppers.

Company description: Dermal Medical guida il mercato della distribuzione di dispositivi elettromedicali ad alta tecnologia specifici per la dermatologia e l'odontoiatria e, più in generale, per l'intero settore dell'estetica medicale non invasiva. Mission dell'azienda è quella di diffondere la cultura del benessere psicofisico attraverso la cura della propria persona. Dermal Medical pone l'accento sulla prevenzione, l'attenzione costante a se stessi e la cura personale quali elementi vitali e di relazione con gli altri. I dispositivi di ultima generazione Dermal Medical, totalmente made in Italy, sono garantiti dai più severi enti certificatori e riconosciuti dal Ministero della Salute. Cavitazione, luce pulsata, radiofrequenza, ossigeno terapia sono le tecnologie che l'azienda mette a disposizione per intervenire sulle manifestazioni degli inestetismi legati a particolari condizioni della pelle.

Company description: Since 1971 reliable ‘turn-key’ partner for the design and manufacturing of die casting moulds (up to 2.500 tons machines) and trimming tools (up to 60 tons presses) for foundries and users of light alloys components (Aluminum, Magnesium and Zink). The profitable cooperation with OEM, Research Organizations and Universities at international level led Saen to develop consolidated experience in the production of prototype tools and samples for automotive, mechanics, electronics, aerospace, rail, furniture and medical sectors. Samples are cast and machined in our internal foundry lab and are dimensionally and geometrically checked through CMM, GOM, leakage test and digital roughness meter. In 6-8 weeks we can deliver components which have been produced with the same technology and the same mechanical characteristics of the series production and we can then take advantage of the acquired knowledge to produce the series die casting tool and trimming tool.

Company description: Forging (y)our future.   Since 1919, Bertot remains at the forefront of hot forging steel an aluminum components, honing them to perfection with advanced machining and surface treatment method.    Our production spans a wide spectrum of components, ranging from large to small formats. The manufacturing process is internal and monitored in each phase, from the design to the finished part, allowing an extremely short TTM.   Thanks to the experience gained over the years and the management of all processes through a high-tech 3D finite element forging simulator, our engineering team offers specific consulting to find the best solution to achieve optimized results.  We support our customers throughout the entire production cycle, from the initial design process to the production of the finished component, relying upon analysis and testing during every phase. We ensure quality without compromises.    Our production processes are constantly evolving, both to meet new demands and to increase our expertise.   We provide tailored solutions for both medium-sized companies and large corporations worldwide, operating in several industrial sectors such as oil and gas, defence, rail, cableways, food, and more.   Bertot has the following certifications:  • ISO/TS22163:2017  • ISO 9001:2015  • NORSOK M-650 Ed.4  • ABS  • DNV  • Ecovadis  • PED 204/68/EU annex I, Section 4.3 - AD2000 Merkblatt W 0  • Moca  You can find us at info@bertot.com or https://www.bertot.com/

Company description: GCR EURODRAW SPA draws its origins from the GCR group of companies that were established back in 1974. The group of engineering companies was called GCR Engineering. This year 2014, GCR EURODRAW is celebrating its 40th Anniversary.   The uniqueness and strengths of GCR EURODRAW resides in the following facts:   DEEP KNOW HOW: The GCR group has always been designing, manufacturing, installing turnkey plants and owned & operated some of these factories to produce bead wire & steel cord products for the tire manufacturing industries, pre-stressed concrete reinforcement wires and strands for the construction industries. The technology and know how earned and accumulated in such complex projects is unmatched up to now from any of GCR’s competitors.   NUMBERS OF LARGE SCALE PROJECTS COMMISSIONED SINCE 1974: 48 Number of steel cord plants & machineries installed and commissioned in 19 countries 27 Number of turnkey steel wire plants installed and commissioned with technology transfer in 14 counties 21 Number of different types of wire plating lines commissioned in 12 countries 45 Number of pre-stressed concrete reinforcement wire & strand production lines sold   Today, GCR EURODRAW still provides more than ever tailored solutions to the wire processing industries that are looking to invest in equipment, machinery, technology, and that need expert technical assistance, dedicated after-sale services and highly capable of training personnel.   GCR EURODRAW expertise and know-how address specifically customers that are manufacturing wire related products for the following market segments: - Automotive (shock absorbers, control cables, clutch…), - Construction (nails, PC strand, PC wire, concrete reinforcement wire…), - Energy (SAW wire, armoring cables, oil platform anchoring cables, ACSR…), - Equipment (elevator, crane, hoist cables and strands...), - Consumer goods (bed springs, coat hangers, staples…), - Agriculture (fence wire, fishing ropes…)

Relco designs and manufactures electronic equipment: LED drivers, transformers, dimmers, emergency systems, obtaining the safety and quality certificates required by the market, always in compliance with international standards. LED technology is continuously evolving, that is why Relco’s technical staff is constantly searching for cutting edge solutions. The solid know-how in the components field has enabled Relco to go even further, developing its own range of lighting devices to be used both outdoors and indoors.

Name: Zoccarato Industrial Coatings
HQ Location: Italy, Veneto, Campodarsego, 11 A Via Frattina, 35011
Technologies: Google Font API, Revslider, Apache HTTP Server, Hotjar, jQuery Waypoints, WordPress, RSS, Open Graph, Priority Hints, Mailcheck, Lightbox, Backstretch, Punycode, oEmbed, jQuery Migrate, MySQL, Google Maps, Nginx, Yoast SEO, Font Awesome, jQuery Validation Plugin, Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, imagesLoaded, jQuery, Slider Revolution, Apache, Google Fonts API, JSON-LD, Microsoft 365, PHP
Company description: Zoccarato Industrial Coatings, realtà storica presente da 60 anni nel settore delle verniciature industriali, è in grado di offrire una ampia gamma di trattamenti superficiali: - Cataforesi - Verniciatura a polvere - Verniciatura a liquido - Sabbiatura - Sigillatura - Carrozzeria I trattamenti vengono eseguiti su metallo e plastica, le cui dimensioni possono variare dai piccoli oggetti della componentistica fino alle grandi dimensioni delle strutture in carpenteria. L’azienda, che rappresenta un’importante realtà industriale, opera in un’area di 50.000 mq, dei quali 17.000 coperti, impiegando più di 180 dipendenti. Zoccarato Industrial Coatings dispone di sei impianti, tre dedicati alla verniciatura a polveri, due alla verniciatura a liquido ed uno per il trattamento di cataforesi. Gli impianti, parte dei quali automatizzati e controllati in postazione remota grazie a video terminali, sono gestiti da uno staff altamente qualificato. Inoltre, sono presenti un reparto per la sigillatura, un reparto per attività di assemblaggio ed un impianto per la verniciatura statica a liquido. I settori nei quali Zoccarato Industrial Coatings opera sono molteplici e comprendono l’arredamento, le macchine agricole e movimento terra, gli elettrodomestici, il settore auto e moto, la refrigerazione, il riscaldamento, la fumisteria, il settore nautico, le scaffalature, il giardinaggio, la minuteria e diversi altri. Grazie all’unione di avanzate tecnologie e di un sistema di gestione dei processi interni ottimale, Zoccarato Industrial Coatings è strutturata per offrire un’eccellente flessibilità ed elevati standard qualitativi.

Company description: Since 1970 CARTES has been producing labels machines. Our facility, is located in a 10,000 sqm area in Moglia near Mantova, where a skilled and professional team works. CARTES has affirmed its success in 88 countries where more than 4,000 machines are installed and recognized for their quality, mechanical strength, precision and high production speed. We constantly aim to find innovative technical solutions for the reels label market. CARTES offers the widest range of label machines with hot stamping, silk-screen printing, flexo printing / varnishing, flat die-cutting, semi-rotary die-cutting, embossing units and with the exclusive LASER technology for die cutting and converting. CARTES first has developed and commercialized the LASER technology applied to self-adhesive label die- cutting. Today, after 16 years, and over 200 LASER machines installed in 45 different Countries, the CARTES LASER technology represents a confirmed success worldwide, not only for the level achieved, but also because the Laser converting unit can be combined with hot stamping, silk-screen printing, flexo varnishing, flat die-cutting, semi-rotary die-cutting and embossing. The combined machines are very appreciated by the label producers as they can fulfill different applications in a single production cycle, creating labels of the highest value.

Company description: A&B Group is a precision turning part manufacturer, leader in turned parts and brass machines supplying. Our factories are located in Italy and Poland (www.aebtorneria.com/contacts/). We offer a high quality turning service, producing turned components from a large range of materials including steel, bronze, brass, aluminium, argentone and copper.  Our turned parts are ready for the use in areas of application like civil and industrial construction, means of transport, domestic and professional machinery, garden machinery, electric tools, mechanical tools, white goods, household appliances, electronics, medical and so on.  As a subcontractor operating in the precision engineering industry, our core business consists in supplying high-precision screw machined components according to the technical drawing specifications provided by the committee. We can face the most sophisticated production processes thanks to a new and refurbished pool of machinery, consisting of mechanical multispindle lathes with integrated numerical control equipments and CNC sliding head and fixed headstock machines. We have a continuous investment strategy in our machining capacity and workforce, a pool of technologically advanced machinery and a team of highly qualified staff.  As a precision turning parts manufacturer and supplier we take care of every phase of manufacture, from the entry of raw materials to the acceptance of orders, right through to delivery of the finished product. In order to guarantee the supply of high precision turned small parts and efficiently satisfy our clients' production needs compliant to current regulations, we offer accurate quality control along the entire production chain. Our management system fulfills the requirements of the following standards: ISO 9001:2015 / ISO 14001:2015 / OHSAS 18001:2007. For further information visit our website or contact us.

Company description: Brovind Vibratori S.p.A. starts in 1956 as “Vibrazioni Industriali”, one of the first companies in Europe specialized in automatic vibratory feeding systems. In the ’80s it acquires a new identity as “Brovind Vibratori s.r.l.”, an independent Company that already contains the core elements of the future Group: manufacturing on their own account of vibratory driving units and electronic command and control devices, with the scope to develop a complete knowhow about vibratory feeding on 360 degrees, from the mechanical aspects to the electronics required to improve them. As today, Brovind Group has a workforce of almost 200 employees, divided on 4 factories: - Brovind Vibratori S.p.A. – main base located in Cortemilia, Italy. The historical main factory, where the vibratory driving units are manufactured and the vibratory feeding systems are customized according to the specifications of the customers. It’s provided with a mechanical design studio working on 3D CAD, CNC workshop, project management office and sales engineers office. A second site, always in Cortemilia, is used to manufacturing the bowls required by the feeding systems and heavy structures. - Brovind Vibratori S.p.A. – Turin branch, Italy. Auxiliary site born in the ’90 to assist in realizing vibratory feeding systems. - Brovind do Brasil – Brazilian branch. Auxiliary site for vibratory feeding systems for South American market. - Brovind Elettronica srl – located in Cortemilia, Italy. Company specialized in developing and manufacturing Brovind’s electronic devices for command and control of vibratory feeding systems. - VIBRATIONS Internal production of its vibratory driving units. - ELECTRONIC Internal manufacturing of its electronic control devices. - TECHNICIANS More than 30 technicians specialized in feeding and sorting techniques. - WORLDWIDE Products sold worldwide - 3D SOFTWARE Internal mechanical design team working with 3D CAD software.

Company description: FARMO RES has been present in the world of thermoforming equipment for over 40 years, designing and constructing machines for packing Pharmaceutical and Healthcare products such as vials, ampoules and syringes. The vertical thermoforming machines for the production of suppositories, ovules and unit doses complete the FARMO RES range for the Pharmaceutical market. FARMO RES also applies its know-how to Cosmetic, Personal Care and Food markets and has been successfully constructing special automatic machines according to the client's needs. FARMO RES makes use of  innovative technologies and electronics to satisfy the  need for production performance and size part flexibility aiming to optimizing time and production costs.  Farmo Res is committed to finding reliable and customized solutions to customer’s needs, this resulting in an high customization of our standard machine range.  Farmo Res also designs and produce a wide range of product managing and loading solutions as buffering systems, detraying and retraying systems, special loading units for difficult or critical products.  Farmo Res works in close contact with other well known and reliable machine builders to offer complete packing lines.

Company description: Euronics CDS is a leading retailer in the consumer electronics and home appliances sector, offering a diverse range of products that include laptops, smartphones, audio devices, and household appliances. The company's mission is to deliver a unique shopping experience by combining quality, innovation, and excellent customer service. Euronics CDS caters to a varied audience, from young technology enthusiasts to families seeking practical home solutions, and partners with prestigious brands such as HP, Acer, Samsung, and Lenovo to ensure access to cutting-edge products.  With a strong commitment to sustainability and innovation, Euronics CDS aims to guide its customers towards a smarter, more technological lifestyle, making technology accessible and user-friendly for everyone. The company emphasizes customer satisfaction by providing a seamless shopping experience both online and in-store, supported by services like in-store pickup and home delivery. Euronics CDS enhances everyday life through technology, focusing on creating innovative store concepts that prioritize accessibility and product interaction, allowing consumers to engage with the latest technologies firsthand. The knowledgeable staff at Euronics CDS is dedicated to assisting customers in making informed choices, ensuring that each individual receives exceptional service and support. The target market includes tech-savvy consumers who value quality products and a smooth shopping experience. By collaborating with major brands to create engaging displays and thematic areas within its stores, Euronics CDS fosters a comprehensive and enjoyable shopping environment, reinforcing its position as a leader in the retail electronics space.

Company description: UNA PIATTAFORMA MUSICALE UNICA E INNOVATIVA, CON OLTRE UN MILIONE DI BRANI ESCLUSIVI Flippermusic è più di una library: è una piattaforma di contenuti musicali di livello internazionale, in continuo aggiornamento. Per noi la diversità è ricchezza: collaboriamo con oltre 200 cataloghi differenti e totalmente indipendenti. Con Flippermusic si entra in un vero e proprio universo di suoni provenienti da tutto il mondo: più di un milione di tracce audio esclusive, che non trovereste in nessun’altra library! Musica per il cinema, documentari, serie tv e cartoon, ma anche spot pubblicitari, podcast e qualunque contenuto per il web e i social, troverà con noi un’identità sonora unica! MENO TEMPO PER TROVARE LA TRACCIA GIUSTA! Grazie a un motore di ricerca avanzato sarà possibile individuare rapidamente la traccia giusta per il proprio progetto. La ricerca sarà ancora più veloce con una reference da cui partire, perché con l’esclusiva intelligenza artificiale del DMC si potrà accedere a una serie di tracce musicali e brani affini a quello indicato: una vera rivoluzione per tutti i nostri clienti. MUSICHE ROYALTY SAFE Flippermusic nasce nel 1968 come Casa Editrice di Production Music e nel tempo diventa anche sub editrice dei principali cataloghi internazionali, gestendone un numero sempre più alto. Nel 2020 si unisce ad Audiofficina, tra le principali Music Rights Management Company specializzata nell’industria audiovisiva italiana, dandosi così una nuova mission: permettere un uso semplice, innovativo e sicuro delle musiche, tutelando sia i professionisti del settore audio e audiovisivo, sia gli artisti. UN TEAM AL TUO SERVIZIO Lo staff di Flippermusic-Audiofficina affianca professionisti e committenti in tutte le fasi della creazione dell’opera: individuazione tracce, definizione licenze, consulenza legale e formalità amministrative. Offriamo un customer care a 360°, veloce e diretto.

Realizziamo, prodotti per il riscaldamento domenistico di alta tecnologia, affidabili, innovativi e di elevata qualità, offrendovi un servizio accurato ed un rapporto di collaborazione e partnership. Seguiamo passo a passo la progettazione e la realizzazione delle termo stufe a pellets ed a legna, delle termo cucine sino ad arrivare ai recenti modelli termo – caldaia a pellets. Fanno parte di Corisit quattro aziende italiane, le quali lavorano nell’ambito del riscaldamento, mettendo sempre al primo posto design e sicurezza.

Company description: Aretè Cocchi Technology, based in Bologna, Italy, is an industrial group devoted to innovation, technology and growth. Established in the 90s by Gino Cocchi, it brings managerial competence and financial resources to industrial high-tech companies undergoing periods of transition, development or re-launch. Today ACT consists of 14 businesses that employ more than 850 people, with manufacturing in Italy, France, Germany, Switzerland, the U.S. and China; commercial and technical centers in 12 countries; and sales in 100+ countries. Its employees represent 30 nationalities. This international culture and presence allows the group to form strong relationships with global markets and customers, as it continues to pursue investments and acquisitions that complement its portfolio in terms of geography, product, technology and expertise.  ACT companies are active in the following industries: integrated packaging and automation technology, airfield ground lighting and control and monitoring systems, power electronics for Big Science and advanced industries, energy distribution in restricted environments, industrial digital printing technology, cooling systems and thermal management.

Company description: TAG24 by Unicusano è il quotidiano online dell’Ateneo Niccolò Cusano di Roma. Nato nel 2015 come organo di informazione e diffusione rivolto alla comunità accademica e non solo; negli anni ha saputo rafforzare la propria identità sul web entrando a far parte del network di Google News. Un progetto di comunicazione dalla doppia anima: da un lato, dare voce alle iniziative, ai progetti di Ricerca e ai volti della Cusano; dall’altro cavalcare i temi di attualità approfonditi nei programmi di Radio Cusano Campus e Cusano Italia TV con la partecipazione di illustri ospiti. TAG24 by Unicusano, pertanto, offre al suo vasto pubblico di lettori aggiornamenti, in tempo reale, su argomenti di politica, economia, diritto, lavoro e formazione, sport, spettacolo, benessere e molto altro, diventando oramai un multisettimanale a carattere informativo generalista su base quotidiana (h24).

Company description: The NDS brand – launched in 1999 by its mother company – while maintaining Vision and an innovative spirit, further expanded its expertise becoming, in 2013, NDS Energy s.r.l.: an ambitious spin-off company that combines thirty years of know-how in the field of accumulators with the most interesting technological innovations in the electronics industry. NDS Energy Today, it can count on a product catalogue that has been considerably expanded since its launch, including: batteries for all types of vehicles and with the main construction technologies, charging systems, solar panels and charge controllers, converters and everything related to energy management and control on recreational vehicles. We are one of the most competitive manufacturers of motorhomes in Europe and we can count on an effective and widespread sales network including Spain, Germany, France, England, Benelux, Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Finland and, of course, Italy. Italy is our headquarters, the core of our activities. We strive for product quality with excellent customer service, which is why we have chosen to keep the R&D and small manufacturing departments in-house, managed by a team of engineers, and the customer service/after-sales department, which keeps our end users close at hand. Our work standards are also adapted to the strict parameters of the CSQ ISO9001:2008 9160 NDSE and IQNet Reg. Nr.: IT-00663, as a guarantee of quality and efficiency for those who prefer our brand.

Company description: “Complicare è facile, Semplificare è difficile. Quello che non si può dire in poche parole non si può dirlo neanche in molte”. (Bruno Munari) Cargo e HighTech nascono da una visione comune che segue tre principi guida nella selezione dei prodotti: funzionalità, estetica e prezzo ragionevole. L'avventura comincia da Milano nel 1982, con curiosità e voglia di scoprire l'insolito quotidiano: dall'Italia agli Stati Uniti, dall'estremo oriente all'America Latina. La scelta consapevole del progetto, allora come oggi, è quella di guardare alla tradizione e al saper fare, senza dimenticare l’innovazione e la creatività: curiosità, gusto e praticità sono gli elementi che accomunano le diverse linee di arredo e oggettistica, dal design all’etnico. Perché oltre a saper fare, bisogna saper agire: creare un design per l’ambiente domestico nella convinzione che originalità e stile stiano nell’eleganza e nella semplicità, nella riscoperta e valorizzazione delle tecniche artigianali e degli ambienti industriali tradizionali, senza prendersi troppo sul serio.

Name: Laservideo Srl
Technologies: Google Font API, Revslider, Google Analytics, Yii, jQuery, reCAPTCHA, Craft CMS, Slick, Nginx, DigitalOcean Web Hosting, YouTube, Open Graph, PHP, iubenda, Apache HTTP Server, CentOS, OpenSSL, cdnjs, Modernizr, Bootstrap, Google Fonts API, Scrollreveal, Animate.Css, jQuery Modal, WhatsApp Business, jQuery Migrate, MySQL, Lightbox, Apache, Slider Revolution, Font Awesome, WordPress, Facebook
Company description: Our Story È il 1989 quando Massimo Flisi, oggi titolare di Laservideo, progetta, crea e prepara per la commercializzazione il suo primo distributore automatico. È un ragazzo di appena vent' anni, neodiplomato, ma il mercato gli dà ragione e la sua tenacia viene premiata dal successo. Ancora giovanissimo comincia a distinguersi nelle fiere di settore, in Italia e all' estero, e i suoi prodotti cominciano a conquistare il pubblico, diffondendosi prima in Italia, poi in Europa e raggiungendo i mercati nordamericani e sudafricani. Puro Made in Italy, ad alta tecnologia. Migliaia di installazioni ne confermano il successo. Laservideo oggi è una solida realtà industriale con sede a Suzzara, in provincia di Mantova. Company description: Dal 1972 rappresentiamo un riferimento costante nel settore della meccanica di precisione, dove siamo “maestri” nella tornitura e fresatura di metalli e polimeri.  Disponiamo di un parco macchine di 30 CNC di ultima generazione e fino a 5 assi.  Effettuiamo inoltre assemblaggi leggeri di componenti meccaniche, elettroniche o pneumatiche.  Il nostro team è composto di 50 persone animate dalla passione per il proprio lavoro, perché - ci piace dire – “LA PRECISIONE ESIGE PASSIONE”.  Chi è appassionato del proprio lavoro lo svolge con competenza, affidabilità e professionalità. COMPETENZA: l’esperienza specifica acquisita negli anni la mettiamo a disposizione del cliente in tutte le fasi di sviluppo del suo prodotto: dalla progettazione, prototipazione e industrializzazione, alla fabbricazione e all’assemblaggio in serie. La realizzazione del pezzo spesso è solo il punto di arrivo di un articolato percorso di interazione col cliente.  AFFIDABILITA’: precisione e puntualità sono i nostri riferimenti costanti sia che si tratti della produzione di un pezzo singolo o di una grande serie, ma all’occorrenza siamo anche in grado di attivarci per una consegna espresso in 48 ore; perché un partner si dimostra tale se non ti lascia mai a piedi. PROFESSIONALITA’: Intermek fornisce al cliente un servizio completo e altamente personalizzato, facendosi carico di gestire sia le lavorazioni interne che tutti gli eventuali trattamenti esterni. Il nostro compito è risolvere i tuoi problemi, non generarne.  Serviamo comparti industriali molto diversi tra loro, ciascuno secondo le proprie specificità: dal settore meccano-tessile a quello degli elettrodomestici, dall’aeronautica al settore dell’arredo/design.

Supportiamo il percorso di cambiamento con l'aiuto di una mental coach. Offriamo inoltre un servizio di consulenza  erboristica gratuita, è il nostro modo per farci sentire vicini ai nostri clienti, come se si trovassero in erboristeria, anche attraverso un computer. Grazie ad una tradizione erboristica che continua dal 1990.  Garantiamo passione, competenza e dedizione. Sempre con il sorriso sulle labbra. Scopri di più sul nostro sito https://www.naturalei.it oppure vieni a visitarci a Crespano del Grappa (TV). Company description: Satur is a well-established Italian brand that specializes in home goods, garden furniture, and small appliances, boasting over 100 retail locations across Italy. The company's mission is to bring a passion for home living closer to people by offering a diverse range of products that seamlessly combine quality, design, and affordability. Satur develops its own brands internally, ensuring that each product reflects its commitment to functionality and authenticity. The company is actively seeking new retail spaces to expand its network, targeting property owners and agencies interested in collaboration. Satur places a strong emphasis on customer satisfaction, providing incentives such as discounts and free shipping for online orders over €59.99. This approach caters to a diverse clientele that values both style and practicality in home decor. The company specializes in the design and manufacturing of high-quality household appliances, with a particular focus on hair dryers, toasters, pizza makers, and milk frothers. Satur is dedicated to safety and user satisfaction, aiming to deliver innovative products that enhance everyday living while ensuring compliance with strict safety standards. The target market for Satur includes domestic consumers, small businesses such as cafes and bed-and-breakfast establishments, and culinary professionals seeking dependable kitchen equipment. By collaborating with various retailers and distributors, Satur ensures that its products are accessible to a wide audience, emphasizing quality and customer support in all its offerings. With a commitment to enhancing the home cooking experience, Satur aims to provide reliable and efficient appliances that cater to the needs of both amateur and professional chefs, allowing users to create café-style beverages and meals with ease.

The company's mission is to deliver quality products at competitive prices while ensuring excellent customer service, reinforcing its commitment to customer satisfaction. Gruppo SME's target market encompasses individuals seeking reliable and affordable solutions for their home and lifestyle needs. The company not only offers a wide selection of televisions and audio equipment but also provides essential household items, making it a one-stop shop for customers. Additionally, Gruppo SME enhances its customer service by offering free old equipment collection and a two-year warranty on its products, further solidifying its reputation for quality and service excellence. Through its commitment to innovation and value, Gruppo SME continues to enhance the shopping experience for its clients across Italy.

Company description: Publishing the music you love since 1860. Edizioni Curci is one of the most important and renowned independent entities in the world of Italian music publishing While also delving in the fruitful realm of genres such as classical, opera and educational, Edizioni Curci is also universally known for giving voice to light and pop music tradition in Italy with internationally successful and timeless hits. Featuring artists from all over music history’s timeline, names appear such as Domenico Modugno, Giovanni D’Anzi, Pino Donaggio, Astor Piazzolla, Toto Cutugno and Giorgio Gaber, also spanning the likes of Vasco Rossi, Tiziano Ferro and Daniele Silvestri , and a catalogue that is constantly growing with repertoire from Claudio Baglioni and Antonello Venditti. Edizioni Curci covers all its bases as a publisher with the biggest names in music from yesterday, today and tomorrow. Bolstered every year, the Edizioni Curci roster flaunts songwriters and artists spread across a wide range of genres. Edizioni Curci has been in the business for over 150 years, standing out from the crowd with its ability to tend to and accompany its songwriters through both the creative process and safeguarding and positioning their work on the music market. Yet another strength in this company is its management of song rights from its musical catalogue as well as those it represents: with a broad network of partners and sub-publishers abroad, Edizioni Curci has a worldwide presence while also offering an endless international catalogue in Italy. With its never-ending repertoire including genre and style, Edizioni Curci’s music steals the spotlight for important advertising campaigns in Italy and the rest of the world and it plays a prime role in movie and television soundtracks.

Company description: Da oltre vent'anni AQUARAMA produce sistemi di lavaggio ad alta pressione, investendo in ricerca e sviluppo, evoluzione tecnologica e innovazione confermate dai vari brevetti ottenuti ed alta tecnologia produttiva per garantire affidabilità, qualità e durata nel tempo. Dagli esordi con gli autolavaggi self-service, che all'epoca rappresentarono una vera rivoluzione in Europa, oggi AQUARAMA offre una gamma completa nel mondo del roll over. Azienda autonoma e dinamica, da sempre attenta alla formazione, AQUARAMA riunisce un team di esperti, costantemente aggiornati su innovazioni tecnologiche, materiali e sistemi altamente performanti. Il design elegante e innovativo è una peculiarità che distingue i prodotti AQUARAMA. Il layout produttivo si avvale di macchinari tecnologicamente all’avanguardia, distribuiti su una superficie di 25.000 m² di cui 12.500 m² coperti. Il team AQUARAMA, costituito da ingegneri ed architetti specializzati, offre un servizio professionale qualificato e “su misura”: analisi di fattibilità, studio approfondito dell'area di posizionamento dell'impianto, progettazione architettonica ed impiantistica idraulica ed elettrica, disegno esecutivo, realizzazione dell'impianto ed installazione effettuata da tecnici specializzati.

Name: DAICOM SRL
Technologies: Facebook, Promo, Telecom, Google, Presidio, Google Font API, IIS, Twitter typeahead.js, jQuery, Google Analytics, Osano, Choices, CloudFlare, Google Tag Manager, Font Awesome, HSTS, Lightbox, YouTube, BootstrapCDN, Google Maps, Windows Server, Onsen UI, Flickity, jsDelivr, jQuery UI, Google Fonts API, PHP, Microsoft IIS, Bootstrap, cdnjs
Company description: Daicom SRL è stata fondata nel 1981 dalla famiglia Dai Zovi che ne è tuttora proprietaria. Fino al 1990 l’azienda si è occupata di prodotti per telecomunicazioni professionali ed amatoriali ma con la nascita della telefonia cellulare si è focalizzata nella distribuzione di telefoni cellulari, accessori e cordless. Oggi la gamma dei prodotti si è ampliata con i tablet, accessori per Apple iPhone ed iPad, video-sorveglianza , action-cam, smart home , e-mobility , TV e PED. Daicom SRL con più di mille clienti attivi  è diventata un punto di riferimento per la distribuzione in tutta Italia, con una struttura di 28 persone interne e  18 agenti sul territorio. Abbiamo contratti di distribuzione anche in esclusiva con i maggiori brand del settore tipo LG, Samsung, Tim, Gigaset, Panasonic, Doro, Alcatel, Huawei, Ezviz , TCL TV ,Midea,etc. Grazie alla veloce logistica interna l’azienda è in grado di servire i Clienti  con una ampia gamma di prodotti consegnati normalmente nelle 24 ore successive all’ordine. Oltre a lavorare con una capillare rete di agenti Daicom SRL si è dotata fin dal 2000 di una veloce ed intuitiva piattaforma web dedicata esclusivamente ai rivenditori, che permette di fornire rapidamente tutte le informazioni commerciali relative a disponibilità, prezzi e promozioni sempre aggiornati in tempo reale permettendo così ai nostri Clienti di seguire in ogni suo momento il processo di evasione dell’ordine ed il tracking della spedizione. Nel 2019  sono stati gestiti più di 45.000 ordini web. Daicom SRL rappresenta uno dei principali distributori Italiani di telefonia diventando, cosi, un punto di riferimento per rivenditori e negozianti

We are building and customizing secondary-packaging machines, listening to customers’ needs, and caring for the protection and integrity preservation of products - from the stocking phases up to the exposure on shelves - with our high-quality and high-tech solutions for over 40 years. Company description: Since 1977 the name IMA has been synonimous with quality and technological innovation. For 40 years our company has dedicated itself to the production of automated machinery and equipment for the garment industry. Thanks to the dedication of our personnel we've been growing each year and nowadays we stand as world leaders in  the cutting room equipment industry. Our decades-long experience, mixed with the energy and the talent of a young and driven team, is what allows us to steadily keep walking on the road of innovation. After being pioneers of digital technology with the creation of the first full-digital spreading machine we are now pioneers of Industry 4.0 with our latest creation: "Syncro Cutting Room" Dal 1977 il nome IMA è sinonimo di qualità ed avanguardia tecnologica.Da quarant'anni la nostra azienda si occupa della produzione di macchinari ed impianti per l'industria della confezione. Grazie alla dedizione e competenza del nostro team l'azienda è cresciuta al punto da diventare leader nel settore.  La nostra esperienza pluridecennale ,unita al talento ed all'energia di un personale giovane e motivato, ci consente di poter continuare ad intraprendere tutt'oggi la strada dell'innovazione. Dopo essere stati pionieri della tecnologia digitale grazie alla creazione del primo stenditore con elettronica full-digital oggi siamo pionieri dell'industria 4.0 con la nostra ultima creazione "Syncro Cutting Room".

Company description: Anni di esperienza, Know how del metodo artigianale e tecnologie avanzate fanno di Nuova Stame Spa, l’azienda leader per la progettazione e costruzione di attrezzature per la deformazione a freddo della lamiera, della pressofusione, della lavorazione della plastica, dei trattamenti termici per la lavorazione dei materiali e dei servizi di engineering. La grande forza è data dal connubio e l’accostamento di sapienti metodi antichi di artigianato con le ultimissime innovazioni tecnologiche. Veri e propri cesellatori, maestri creatori di forme e abili scultori arricchiscono il patrimonio di Nuova Stame garantendo a ciascun cliente la qualità del prodotto, nel rispetto dei tempi richiesti, fattore indispensabile e valore aggiunto per raggiungere la perfezione del prodotto finito. L’eccellenza produttiva è data dalla versatilità e competenza del nostro Team. L’Ampia gamma di stampi costruiti da Nuova Stame Spa trovano applicazione nei settori della carrozzeria e della componentistica per auto, per motocicli e macchine agricole, nonché nel settore degli elettrodomestici. Tutti gli stampi sono appositamente studiati, ideati e realizzati per soddisfare le esigenze e richieste dei clienti. Fiore all’occhiello di Nuova Stame sono gli stampi di grandi dimensioni con movimentazione a robot per la realizzazione di parti di carrozzeria e ossatura interna e di struttura dell’automobile. Non meno importanti sono gli stampi a trasferte e stampi progressivi per la realizzazione, con materiale inossidabile, di silenziatori o di pezzi estetici di struttura. Nello specifico, si differenziano in stampi di imbutitura, stampi di rifilatura, stampi di tranciatura, stampi di piegatura, stampi di trancia-sviluppo, stampi per operazioni multiple, stampi a passo progressivo, stampi a passo trasfertizzato e organi di traslazione.
