Company description: SAF  is specialized in the design and manufacturing of dies for cold sheet metal forming and in the production of metal parts.  We supply different sectors among which: gas, hydraulics, pneumatics, automotive, home appliances, illumination, electro-mechanics, furnishing. Some of the parts we could supply include:   Metal parts for connections systems, valves, pipes, press fittings, manifolds and adapters. Sleeves, plates, support brackets, terminals, pin, connectors, covers, support bearings, laminations, reel to reel, deep drawn parts and many others. These parts are produced with different materials such as copper, brass, bronze, stainless steel, bimetal. The company offers a service including feasibility analysis, development of the project, prototyping, industrialization, manufacturing of the tool, production. Following the UNI EN 9001:2015 and IATF 16949:2016  standards, our quality service can provide samples with PPAP documentation and ensure a high process cability for each production, certified by the dimensional report. Moreover, our company works with qualified and certified suppliers providing our customers with a complete service, delivering finished products with the most different surface and heat treatments, such as deburring, selective plating, galvanizing, washing according to ISO 16232.

Company description: Il progetto “Secondhand mobile” nasce dalla nostra trentennale esperienza nel settore delle telecomunicazioni e ventennale nel mercato dell’usato. Esperienza diretta nella distribuzione al dettaglio. Vediamo il mercato coi vostri occhi perché siamo rivenditori proprio come voi, a diretto contatto col pubblico.  È orientato alle piccole e medie imprese che da anni operano nel settore o a nuove realtà che intendono investirvi in modo alternativo.  Non ha la presunzione di presentarsi come Franchisor esclusivista, ma propone un modello di integrazione al business di realtà esistenti, gestite da specialist, dealers e affiliati a gestori di telefonia mobile, centri assistenza tecnici, negozi di elettronica di consumo. Lo scopo è quello di aprire ai nostri partners le porte del mercato dell’usato. Un mercato che da 10 anni è in costante crescita a due cifre e che rappresenta una nicchia sempre più importante nello scenario internazionale di questo settore. Integrazione che rappresenta l’opportunità di incrementare la ormai scarna redditività attualmente condizionata da ricarichi sempre più miseri sul prodotto, concorrenza sleale del mercato, partners sempre più imperativi e pretenziosi a fronte di compensations in costante decremento.

Company description: Movitech Srl è un’azienda italiana giovane e dinamica, con oltre 15 anni di esperienza nel settore dell’automazione industriale e dell’elettronica.  Progettiamo e realizziamo quadri elettrici industriali, impianti elettrici per macchine automatiche, software e controlli di processo. Grazie a un approccio orientato all’innovazione, integriamo la nostra offerta con soluzioni su misura per migliorare l’efficienza, contenere i costi e aumentare la flessibilità produttiva dei nostri clienti, mantenendo sempre al centro i nostri valori: qualità, sicurezza e affidabilità. Dal 2020, con l’acquisizione di Arte Nuova Srl, abbiamo ampliato le nostre competenze nel software industriale, offrendo lo sviluppo completo di soluzioni PC, PLC e HMI personalizzate, progettate in stretta collaborazione con i clienti per garantire il massimo controllo e le migliori performance dei macchinari. Offriamo anche servizi di avviamento e assistenza post-vendita, sia da remoto che on-site. Dal 2025 facciamo parte di AFT System Group, realtà di riferimento nel packaging e nell’automazione industriale: un passo strategico che ci consente di offrire ancora più valore, know-how e sinergie. 🔗 Scopri di più su www.aftsystem.com Your Project, Our Passion

Company description: Nel luglio del 1993 nasce Ottica 2M a Crocetta del Montello (TV). L’attenzione alla continua evoluzione del mercato e alle esigenze della clientela porta ad ampliare l’attività con una prima ristrutturazione, e successivamente, nel 2014 al trasferimento a Montebelluna in un’ampia e nuova sede. Il nostro staff, composto da 27 collaboratori preparati e costantemente aggiornati, è in grado di supportarvi e di soddisfare ogni vostra esigenza. L’esposizione cornerizzata e moderna di ogni prodotto, ha lo scopo di rendere unica l’esperienza e l’emozione del tuo acquisto.   Inoltre abbiamo inaugurato il primo Rudy Concept Store d’Italia: uno spazio dove lo sportivo può trovare il più grande assortimento di soluzioni visive per lo sport presente in Italia. I nostri studi, dotati di strumentazione all’avanguardia e di ultima generazione, permettono controlli visivi mirati e specializzati, volti a soddisfare ogni tipo di necessità (contattologia, ipovisione, sportivo e bambino). Per noi un cliente è soddisfatto quando riceve, non semplicemente un prodotto, ma un significativo valore aggiunto dato dal servizio, dalla consulenza e dall’assistenza, che sono i cardini con cui tutto il nostro staff si presenta al cliente e che ci permettono di essere alla guida del nostro settore. La nostra azienda è nata con l’intento di volersi impegnare per dare sempre il meglio alla propria clientela. Questo spirito che ci caratterizza e ci rende esclusivi è insito nel nostro store e in ognuno dei professionisti che collaborano con noi. Il nostro obbiettivo è quello di far vivere al cliente un’esperienza memorabile, che possa superare le aspettative, e soddisfarne i desideri.

Company description: The WAGO Group is an international, standard-setting supplier of electrical interconnection and automation products and interface electronics. The family-run company is the world market leader in spring pressure connection technology. WAGO has continued to grow since being founded in 1951, with a current worldwide workforce of more than 8.500, with more than 3.900 of these in Germany at its headquarters in Minden (North Rhine-Westphalia) and in Sondershausen (Thuringia). The company achieved sales of EUR 932 million in 2018. WAGO products are used globally in power and process technology, building automation, machinery and equipment, as well as industrial and transportation applications. They are trusted anywhere electrical conductors must be connected to each other or where complex automation systems must be controlled. Here they have continuously been proven to contribute to safety and the reliable operation of devices and complete installations. WAGO Elettronica srl, the only Italian branch of the group, was founded in 1996 in Bologna. The WAGO Group consists of nine international production and main sales locations, 19 additional sales offices and the M&M Software specialist. In addition, there are representatives in over 80 countries, giving the company a strong global presence. WAGO has been in the manufacturing business since 1951: initially at the company headquarters in Minden (North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany), which expanded in 1971 to Roissy (France), in 1977 to Domdidier (Switzerland), in 1979 to Milwaukee (USA), and in 1990 to Sondershausen (Thuringia, Germany), as well as Tokyo (Japan). Other production sites include Delhi (India) founded in 1995, and 1997 expansions into Tianjin (China) and Wroclaw (Poland).

Company description: Essepigi progetta, produce e commercializza macchine ed impianti gestiti da PC per la lavorazione di profili e pannelli in legno. Acquistando un prodotto Essepigi il cliente beneficia della lunga esperienza acquisita collaborando con centinaia di clienti in ogni parte del mondo. Qualità del prodotto finito e flessibilità nella produzione sono i principi cardine di ogni realizzazione Essepigi. La nostra attenzione al cliente si manifesta sia nella consulenza per identificare la giusta soluzione nell'investimento, sia nell'impegno notevole nell'assistenza post-vendita. La nostra storia inizia nel 1973, anno di fondazione della società Essepigi S.r.l. ,la produzione Essepigi è concentrata principalmente su macchine automatiche per la lavorazione del profilo, per i settori della porta e del mobile. ___________________________________________________________________________________ Essepigi design, produces and sell machines and plants controller by PC for the machining of wooden profiles and panels. By buying an Essepigi product the customer benefits of the long experience acquired working with hundreds of customers all over the world. The high quality of the finished product and the production flexibility are the key principles of each Essepigi creation. Our attention to the customer is manifested both in counselling to identify the right solution in the investment, and in great after-sales service.Our story begins in 1973, when the company Essepigi Srl was established, founded as the conversion of an existing company already active since the 60s in the production of double cutting-off machines. By exploiting this wealth of experience, since 1974 Essepigi also began the production of special combined machines for cutting and drilling, a world exclusive in this area. The production is still mainly concentrated on automatic machines for the processing of the profile, for the sector of the door and of the furniture. info@essepigi.com - commerciale@essepigi.com

Siamo oggi un punto di riferimento a livello nazionale per assortimento, affidabilità e capacità di innovazione. Selezioniamo con cura i migliori brand del settore e aggiorniamo costantemente le nostre linee prodotto, proponendo una gamma completa che spazia dai giocattoli best-seller della TV alle novità creative ed educative, pensate per stimolare lo sviluppo e il gioco intelligente. La nostra sede operativa e showroom si trovano a Tito, in Basilicata, ma serviamo clienti su tutto il territorio nazionale. Company description: SARIV is a company which has been present in the market since 1990. With a high-tech production process in continuous development, SARIV has rapidly reached a leading position within the international market of blind rivets and blind rivet nuts. SARIV offers its customer the product engineering and the manufacturing of the product, to provide the ideal solution for every application. The design of the equipment for the production and process engineering are carried out by its own technical department. All production steps, including zinc plating, are carried out internally and comply with the requirements of the quality system according standard UNI EN ISO 9001:2008 for the design, production and sale of rivets and threaded inserts. Within the company, there is also a sorting department through cameras, in order to provide products with PPM 30. All production documents required for product certification for Automotive industry, from IMDS to PPAP and VDA, can be provided . SARIV currently supplies its products to all the major European car manufacturers. PRODUCTION SITE, DISTRIBUTION AND LOGISTICS WITH AUTOMATIC WAREHOUSE Production site of over 22.500 square meters, 6.000 coveted - Daily production of 3 million pieces - Over 700 rivets and blind rivet nuts in catalogue, and as many ‘special’ products, developed for Industrial and Automotive sectors. - All production processes for rivets and blind rivet nuts are made internally, zinc plated process included Today SARIV owns 5 SARIV distribution companies in Eastern Europe, and cooperates and produces for all the major brands of the market.

Company description: CMZ SISTEMI ELETTRONICI engineers and produces in Italy electronic systems for industrial motion control. We target to OEMs and systems integrators for the co-development of automatic machines and equipment with customized and specific configurations in multi-axis motion. Established in 1976 focusing on the production of controllers & drives, today the company offers complete motion & control solutions including the systems design, the electronics programming, the development of ready-to-use motion & application libraries and ad-hoc softwares, alongside with a wide selection of master controllers IEC61131 up to 99 axis, servo drives, brushless and stepper motors up to 120 Nm strictly compact and Made in Italy, peripherals and I/O modules both digital and analogic, HMI operator panels. Our high technological and safety standing is based on a team of 70 technicians and engineers. The systems realized to date in our factory count over 125,000 units. CMZ is a Research Laboratory recognized by the Italian Ministry for Scientific Research. The company is part of SOGA ENERGY TEAM industrial group operating in power generation, motion and control since 1966.

Company description: Un punto di riferimento in Italia per le forniture industriali e la distribuzione di articoli tecnici per la movimentazione e l’automazione industriale  Nata negli anni ‘80 come azienda familiare dall’esperienza di Armando Facchinetti nel settore dei cuscinetti a sfera, grazie a una crescita costante e a una serie di accordi strategici con i marchi più prestigiosi e le aziende leader nel settore, oggi ATTI srl è un’affidabile realtà che propone un catalogo completo di componenti e articoli tecnici per le trasmissioni industriali, acquistabili anche online grazie al servizio ecommerce.  A disposizione del cliente offriamo anche il supporto di un reparto tecnico particolarmente qualificato, esperto in programmazione di strumenti elettronici. Negli anni l'evoluzione dei servizi offerti ha portato a un'importante specializzazione nella creazione di sistemi di motion control; da lì il passaggio anche al settore della robotica, con la partnership ufficiale stretta nel 2016 per la distribuzione dei robot industriali Yamaha per il mercato italiano.

Company description: TOYO TANSO EUROPE SpA belongs to Toyo Tanso Group, since 1997, when ROGNONI S.p.A was bought and renamed as TOYO TANSO EUROPE S.p.A. in Italy. Toyo Tanso began as Kondo Carbon Kogyosho manufacturing carbon brushes in 1941.  Since becoming the first company in the world to successfully mass produce large-size isotropic graphite in 1974, the Toyo Tanso Group's carbon products and technology have continued to evolve with the needs of the time.  Toyo Tanso Europe S.p.A. is specialized in mass production of carbon brush and realization of graphite components according to customer drawings.  Thanks to our technical department, customized CFC (carbon fiber composite) structures can be designed and realized. CFC represent the ideal solution in heat treatment field, due to his great mechanical and physical properties: high strength, light weight, and high dimensional stability at high temperatures.  We currently cover a wide range of fields such as automobiles and home appliances to cutting-edge products in such fields as aerospace, medical care and next-generation as semiconductors.

One of the pioneers of GPS technology and satellite navigation, AvMap keeps on manufacturing in Italy high-quality electronics and telematics solutions for any type of environment: land, sea, sky.   Since 1994 it has been leading the development of technologies to improve safety in every sector of mobility and is committed to transferring technological advances into all fields of application, from avionics, to the automotive sector, to marine electronics, to intelligent agriculture, waste management and smart cities. AvMap aims at becoming a point of reference for electronic design and IOT applications, to help private companies and institutions shape the telematics services of the future, making environments more practical, sustainable, safe and livable.

Over the years we have developed, manufactured, and patented high-tech tools to improve the quality control of the welding cycle. We operate in numerous sectors, including medical, para-medical, automotive, packaging, paper converting, large roofing. The internal development of electronic and software design allows us to offer the market latest generation systems and to guarantee complete customer assistance, even remotely, monitoring of process parameters and quality control. Ours is a constantly evolving story: we always want to be alongside our customers to grow together with them, guaranteeing maximum availability and always innovative products.

Company description: High technological level for a high standard performance, our strength is the attention we reserve to our machines customization process, in order to satisfy every customers' need and pave the road to new possible solutions to optimize their work. Being on the market since almost 50 years, evolution has always been a keystone for our company and, according to our experience, it completely matches with commitment and research. Research both for new technologies and for new materials as well, always aiming at the future. In our wide range of activities, we offer every single service from the very beginning of a project, discussing with the customer about concrete needs and ideas, through an attentive study on their production, to build a fully customized machine in order to achieve the best outcome for the final product. Automation for inspection (with operator or cameras), cutting and packing is definitely our signature. The top of our production range, regarding the optimization, is our auto cutting model SuperTestaRossa, well known among our customers as the textile Ferrari because of its cutting at high speed (up to 300 mt/min). Besides our experienced technical and computer departments, we also have an efficient assistance service, able to follow every customer’s inquiry or after sales requirement, from managing the supply of original spare parts to arrange interventions oncustomer’s site to fix problems in the shortest time possible. Our assistance package includes tele-assistance as well, allowing us to sort out problems on our machines at distance and in real time. Moreover, we provide a counseling service for customers who wish for help to set up their production lines, to sell their machines or to purchase second-hand machineries.

Name: Kinegge Srl
Company description: Kinegge è una società sita in Lucignano (AR). È conosciuta in tutto il mondo come fornitrice di soluzioni e servizi tecnologici che garantiscono la sicurezza e l'efficienza economica dell’industria energetica, e come realizzatrice di apparati per l’automazione industriale. Kinegge (Ex Diakont Srl)  è stata fondata in Toscana nel 2014 con l’obiettivo di produrre attuatori elettromeccanici destinati alle unità di movimento dei robot industriali e dell’automazione utilizzata nei moderni sistemi di produzione. A Maggio 2021 Diakont ha ultimato i lavori di costruzione del nuovo sito produttivo ad alta tecnologia di Lucignano (AR), realizzato secondo i fondamenti dell’industria 4.0, destinato alla produzione in serie di attuatori elettromeccanici di elevata precisione.  Sono entrate in funzione le nuove le linee produttive costituite dai più moderni macchinari CNC ad alta precisione (DMG-Mori, Doimak, Leistritz, CMZ, ecc.), macchine CMM di misura (Zeiss, Mitutoyo, Jenoptik, ecc.)  e dal sistema di magazzino automatizzato, fornito dalla società CASSIOLI srl.

Name: Torneria Serra

Company description: Founded in Turin during the post—war years by Tommaso Serra, father of Carlo, the current General Manager, Torneria Serra was established to provide tool and die equipment. Over time the company has gradually modified its core business by shifting towards manufacturing a large series of lathed and milled workpieces for the automotive, household appliance and industrial markets. In recent years, Torneria Serra has further specialized in manufacturing more sophisticated mechanical components. Through the achievement of ISO 9001 certification first and later, of ISO TS 16949, the company was able to strengthen its position in the AUTOMOTIVE market, becoming a partner to car manufacturers and OEMs.  Torneria Serra currently delivers nearly 30 million workpieces per a year, thus consuming about 6,000 tons of raw materials.

Company description: Established in 1969, FIS IMPIANTI is the classic private company so common in Europe, mainly in Italy, where the management covers the most important role surrounded by technician staff.  Premises are in Cassina de’ Pecchi, in the hinterland area of Milan.  They cover an area of 10.000 sqmt, of which some 2400 for workshop and warehouse and 1200 for offices. Since 30 years FIS IMPIANTI has been designing, developing, manufacturing and installing machines and complete lines for palletised items (with or without wooden pallet) by means of shrinking or stretching film.   The use of plastic films for the protection of palletised loads during transportation and stocking started in the furnaces and building material field of activity (in addition to the transportation, the plastic film solved also the problem of exposition to weather conditions).   The entrance of FIS IMPIANTI into the paper mill area dates back to the early ‘80s, with the first stretching film wrapping machine for paper rolls coming from the pope and destined to converting. In this field of activity, FIS can supply, in addition to semiautomatic and fully automatic machines, a wide range of equipment for paper rolls handling up to the final shipping stage.  FIS IMPIANTI 's range includes the possibility to process the information on the Customer’s production by means of the most modern technology: product recognition, automatic dimensions detection, weighing, label printing and sticking, data transmission to/from the Host Computer and the like.   Our experience and flexibility is at Customers’ disposal for evaluation of projects and manufacturing of  special, tailor made machinery.

Company description: Sitec S.r.l. has been operating since its foundation in 1994 as an active reality in the supply of solutions for industrial automation and has developed considerable experience in the supply of components and systems that are used in the complex industrial automation sector.   Competence and professionalism therefore as requirements and principles on which our way of operating is based, but also quality of products supplied, borrowed from the integration of prestigious brands to guarantee and protect the customer's investment. The traditional activity is aimed at manufacturers of operating machines, system integrators, end-users with whom we try to establish long-lasting relationships and long-term partnerships. SITEC S.r.l. focuses on the supply of the best automation solutions and provides in addition to the sale of products including a series of related services such as customer assistance in defining the control architecture, training in the use of the product, assistance in start-up phase in addition to after-sales services. We collaborate with leading companies that delegate us in the delicate task of representing them on the territory. This is a reason for great satisfaction, but at the same time represents a commitment that we try to honour with the utmost dedication. The extreme specialization and focus as well as the continuous commitment to propose always innovative and reliable solutions makes us a safe, reliable and competent partner. The offer includes everything related to the architecture of an automation system, which starts from the heart of the system, typically consisting of a PLC, a PC or a CNC as well as everything that manage it (drives and actuators), processes (sensors) and to which it is associated (HMI devices, networks and products for field bus). For more information, please visit the SITEC website: https://www.sitec-novara.it/

Company description: Fastrent è stata fondata nel 2006 da professionisti che, già dal 1983, insieme ad un team di giovani architetti e ingegneri diedero vita ad una società di servizi tecnici e culturali.  Le principali attività di Fastrent SpA sono distinte in tre canali commerciali:  1 - Il Noleggio Operativo per conto terzi di strumenti ed attrezzature professionali di ogni genere.  Per informazioni visita il sito www.fastrent.it 2- Il Comodato d’Uso e/o il  Noleggio di stampanti multifunzione. Per informazioni visita il sito www.noleggiofacile.com 3 · Il Noleggio a lungo termine di PC, Notebook e Tablet e di qualsiasi altro prodotto ICT. Per informazioni visita il sito www.noleggiofacile.com. L’azienda dispone di una rilevante struttura operativa, di propri mezzi di trasporto e occupa nelle sedi un organico medio di 30 unità altamente specializzate, che insieme alla rete vendita composta da funzionari commerciali distribuiti su tutto il territorio nazionale le consentono di poter offrire sempre soluzioni all’avanguardia e quotazioni fortemente competitive. Alla competenza professionale e commerciale si aggiunge un’adeguata conoscenza tecnica e informatica grazie ad un team di assistenza di primo livello.  Fastrent SpA è un’azienda in forte crescita ed in continua espansione su tutto il territorio nazionale con la Direzione a Roma e sedi a Milano, e Settefrati (FR).   Fastrent Spa si pone come interlocutore unico per le PMI, capace di soddisfare qualsiasi loro esigenza in termine di efficienza, innovazione e risparmio fornendo loro strumenti, beni e servizi per la loro attività.

Da sempre impegnata nella progettazione e produzione di alimentatori, caricabatterie, trasformatori e nella distribuzione di componenti e accessori per il settore elettrico e elettronico. Obiettivo fondamentale il mantenimento di un alto livello di affidabilità e sicurezza. Tutti i nostri prodotti vengono sottoposti a rigorosi collaudi e scrupolosi controlli. L’alta priorità attribuita alla ricerca e sviluppo ci permette di mantenere un elevato know-how in un settore in continua evoluzione. Alpha Elettronica con una costante attenzione alla clientela, progetta e realizza soluzioni personalizzate, innovative e all’avanguardia. Il dialogo con i nostri fornitori, italiani ed esteri, ci permette un monitoraggio costante delle innovazioni di mercato anche nel rapporto qualità/prezzo. In Alpha Elettronica gli individui sono la nostra forza e rappresentano la garanzia dei nostri valori aziendali.

Company description: Satis Spa was founded in 1970 by Enzo Mantellassi, President and Managing Director of the Company.   Since the beginning SATIS has been manufacturing using traditional craftsmanship techniques and experience. Nowadays, as a modern manufacturing company, SATIS is using high-tech machineries in order to guarantee and maintain top quality levels of the products.   SATIS is managed by the Mantellassi family: Enzo, Laura (Enzo’s wife), and their two sons Martina and Lorenzo.   All the manufacturing phases are carried out in the 20.000 square meters plant based in Quarrata, PT (Italy).   Raw materials and semi-finished products are purchased directly from the primary markets and then finished in the company’s facilities (timber frames and polyurethane foam) or at specialized and properly selected suppliers (leathers). This direct supervision allows Satis to offer quality and lasting products. Satis products are hand-made by expert craftsmen and represent the result of a precious “know-how” carefully passed on to the new staff members.   Satis guarantees a high level of service, timely pre-and post sales assistance. An attentive and professional staff is ready to cover any request, both technical and commercial. The current production include contemporary style models, modern, classic, relax, “easy bed” sofas, bunk-bed sofas, beds and relax sofa-bed. All these designs stand out for their comfort and for the possibility of personalization that only Satis can offer.

Company description: Ecostar is committed to continuously elevate the possibilities and performance in screening of wastes and scrap materials. This is the company’s true vocation, with the final objective of improving a process that benefits the planet and humans alike, while at the same time ensuring more professional and economic efficiency for sector operators. Ecostar works primarily with designers and builders of systems for waste disposal and the production of biomass, ecological fuels and compost, renewable energies, utility companies, and public and private multi-utilities, service providers. In order to make the most advanced and innovative available to these final users, who day after day are moving the state of the art technologies in the sector forward, Ecostar invests in continuous research and development, committing a team of young, highly motivated and well trained designers and technicians, capable of implementing the most modern tools available. The goal of this highly skilled team is to continue to push the operational limits and performance margins of the dynamic screen forward, as well as to perfect the systems that implement the star screen to their maximum, a solution that is still indicated today for specific uses. The goal is an ambitious one: to make a mark in the evolution of a technology destined to limit the profound impact left by humans on the environment.

Company description: Microdevice, a company specialized in "Building Automation", is based in Flero, in the province of Brescia. Founded in 1981, with the mission of producing electronic equipment for industrial automation, Microdevice began to specialize itself at the end of the 80s in the construction of highly reliable components in the building automation sector. The founder, Claudio Abrami, tells with emotion the years when he was born in the desire to create a system to manage buildings in an automated way: "My dream was born in 1972, from a promise made to friends of the electronic 'ITIS, and was realized in the' 80s when, among the first, we used the protocols used today in telecommunications and embarked on the path of quality, with the obsessive search for the best performances. "Today, Microdevice has installed its own supervision systems throughout Italy, and in part of the world in public and private facilities, Hotels, Hospitals, Homes for the elderly, offices and prestigious homes. It has acquired a great deal of experience and has numerous applications. Always in constant growth, and in continuous evolution of the products, which builds and designs, the company has always maintained a close relationship with the customers and is recognized for its seriousness, ethics and reliability.

Choosing Siatem means to rely to a brand which takes part actively in the international market, developing new technologies and supplying innovative induction solutions. Company description: Founded back in 2009 by a group of young, skilled and enthusiastic gamers and artists, Cranio Creations quickly evolved in one of the most well-known board game publishers in Italy. We offer games suitable for every occasion or gaming group, focusing our production on ingenious and innovative mechanics along with a gorgeous graphical design. Most of our games are entirely designed and developed by our creative team, and distribuited around the world! We also localize games from many of our international partners (Feuerland, CGE, Spielwiese Edition etc.) Our catalogue features a number of international award-winning games, like Codenames (2016 Spiel des Jahres) and Terra Mystica (2013 Kennerspiel des Jahres). But our field of action is not limited to the board game world: we also collaborate with a wide range of educational and pedagogic professional to create useful tools for educational applications. We are also converting most of our most successful games for the mobile platform - iOS and Android - to widen our customer base. Our most innovative advertising strategy, the ApeCranio, is a successfull blend of modern guerrilla marketing and traditional selling platforms: our operators, riding a customized three-wheeler, offer our products to people in every part of Milan.

Company description: OEMER MOTORI ELETTRICI S.P.A. is a leading Italian manufacturer of high performance industrial electric motors, operating since 1949 in Rescaldina (Milan), Italy. The production range is aimed to a diversified customer base which includes small, medium and large national companies, as well as international groups, which produce machines, systems, power electronics, transmission systems and industrial automation. The production of components and the assembly of motors takes place in our factory in Rescaldina, where the most up-to-date devices and machinery, such as machining centers, numerical controlled lathes, automatic winders and robots, are used to continuously improve the quality of our products.  A modern and complete test-bench is used during different stages of the production process, for both test and quality control. The quality system of the factory is certified according to ISO 9001. Highly qualified staff, advanced technology and continuous investments in systems and devices together with flexibility in the production, are the factors which within a short period enable manufacturing new products with high quality standards and reliability. The catalog includes AC 3-phase asynchronous inverter duty motors and servomotors, available with different degrees of protection (IP 23/54/55) and cooling mode (air / liquid) as well as high efficiency synchronous servomotors (IE4), reluctance motors and torque motors. Thanks to the experience acquired in 70 years of activity in the specific sector of electric motors and to the technology investments carried out during time OEMER is able to design and manufacture even "custom" motors, both from the electrical and mechanical point of view, in order to satisfy the needs of specific customers or projects.

Company description: Biko Meccanica Srl was founded in 1984 and has soon become a world-wide leader in the design and manufacturing of machines and plants for the conversion of flexible materials. From small, standalone machines (such as Presses, Belt Slitters, Cut-to-Length Machines) to medium-sized machines (such as Skiving Machines, Roll Slitters, Flap-Wheels Machines, Die Cutting Machines, Lamination Machines), and up to large, high-performance, computer-controlled plants, Biko Meccanica is able to cover any kind of processing need, with equipment ranging from manually operated machines to fully automated plants. With over 35 years of experience in the sector of flexible material conversion, and thanks to key partners such as international manufacturers and consultants, Biko Meccanica can provide a full range of solutions, from standard machines up to fully-customized, built-to-order machines. Research and development occupies an important role in Biko Meccanica: our latest designs focus on machines for abrasive production, with the goal of becoming a single provider for both abrasive manufacturing and conversion. Located in the North-East of Italy, in the heart of Europe, Biko Meccanica groups a team of high-skilled, dynamic mechanical and electrical engineers and specialized workforce. The manufacturing facility covers an area of about 6,000 square meters, with the possibility for further expansion.

Company description: Sydex is a modern, global manufacturer of progressing cavity pumps, grinders and macerators. We provide extensive expertise and knowledge throughout the World, enabling us to become totally focused on our customers’ needs from manufacturing through to delivery, documentation, installation and after-sales support.   We manufacture a wide range of high quality, cost effective progressing cavity pumps (also known as helical rotor pumps, waste water pumps and sometimes as progressive cavity or simply pc pumps) macerators and grinders.   Our pumps incorporate the original Moineau™ pump design with the stator bonded into a steel tube (flows from 6 L/h up to 240 m3/h, and pressures up to 48 bar). Our waste water pumps and macerator pumps are installed throughout the world. Our in-house stator manufacturing capability enables us to ensure superior quality whilst providing cost-effective, innovative solutions and reliable delivery times. Our products:  Sydex provides and adapts a wide range of products to meet your requirements according to your application, flowrate and pressure:     • Horizontal Progressing Cavity Pumps   • Hygienic Progressing Cavity Pumps   • Vertical Progressing Cavity Pumps   • Hopper feeding screw PCP   • Grinders and macerators pumps   • Shaftless screw conveyors Our applications: Sydex provides different pumping solutions which take into account the features of a wide range of applications such as:     • Food & beverages   • Mining & quarries   • Marine   • Waste water treatment   • Biogas   • Oil&Gas

Company description: The Orchestra da Camera di Mantova was founded in 1981 and has proven to have technical brilliance, great attention to style and a constant search for sound quality. In 1997, Italian musical critics awarded the Orchestra da Camera di Mantova the “Franco Abbiati” prize for its “unique stylistic refinement and constant search for sound quality, which merges Italian instrumental tradition and classical repertoire”. The orchestra performs in Teatro Bibiena in Mantova, which is an authentic jewel of architecture and acoustics. The Orchestra da Camera di Mantova has been performing for over 30 years with world-renowned conductors and soloists; some of these include: Gidon Kremer, Shlomo Mintz, Joshua Bell, Salvatore Accardo, Umberto Benedetti Michelangeli, Giuliano Carmignola, Uto Ughi, Mischa Maisky, Enrico Dindo, Mario Brunello, Miklos Perenyi, Sol Gabetta, Alexander Lonquich, Bruno Canino, Katia and Marielle Labeque, Maria Tipo, Andrea Lucchesini, the unforgettable Astor Piazzola and Severino Gazzelloni to name a few. The OCM has given numerous concerts both in Italy and abroad and has performed in theatres and concert halls all over Europe, the USA, Central and South America and Asia. The Orchestra da Camera di Mantova has recorded for several television and radio programs such as RAI, Bayerischer Rundfunk and the Swiss RSTI. In September 2009, the ensemble recorded three of Haydn’s symphonies, on commission by the most important Italian musical magazine, “Amadeus”. Most recently, with a recording project dedicated to Mozart’s piano concertos, the orchestra has recorded two well-appreciated CDs together with pianist Angela Hewitt that have been published by Hyperion in 2011. Since 1993, the Orchestra da Camera di Mantova has held a very successful yearly season, Tempo d’Orchestra, with the contribution of famous Italian and foreign soloists, chamber groups and orchestras from around the world.

Nel 2010 Metalstar 2000 acquisisce l’azienda Futura: un marchio storico nella produzione di raddrizzatrici e profilatrici legno (fin dalle prime macchine Rotomat). Con la denominazione di Futura Woodmac, nasce una nuova azienda in totale sinergia con Metalstar 2000 che vi infonde nuove competenze, nuove risposte, nuove soluzioni, sia per hobbisti e falegnamerie che per l’industria del legno, rilanciandola sul mercato internazionale con ottimi risultati attraverso: il rinnovamento delle linee di tutti i prodotti venduti, su livelli ancora più elevati di rapidità, precisione e sicurezza in grado di soddisfare pienamente le necessità operative di clienti sempre più esigenti, e progettazione di nuovi prodotti. Alle soglie di un nuovo decennio, la storia imprenditoriale di Metalstar 2000 prosegue ininterrotta la sua crescita in: - addetti e tecnici dell’officina metalmeccanica; - macchinari di nuova generazione ad alta tecnologia; - area produttiva tra più stabilimenti; - clienti soddisfatti e consolidati negli anni. Company description: Teseo SRL was founded in 1988 and initially worked within the textile industry as an industrial supplier and engineering consultants. During this period they discovered several problems linked to many factory’s compressed air distribution systems. The traditional pipework distribution systems, such as Black and Galvanised steel, had many limitations and restrictions for the distribution of Compressed Air such as low flow rates, high pressure drop, corrosion, fluid contamination and major difficulties in modifying the installations.  As a solution to solve these problems, Teseo began to design and develop a modular aluminium pipework system for the distribution of compressed air. In the early 90’s Teseo were the first company to successfully develop and bring to market a Modular Aluminium Pipework System specifically designed for the distribution of Compressed Air and other fluids.  Combining the features of a structural profile together with the full flow of a pipe, Teseo achieved one of the most innovative systems for fluid power distribution.  Modern high tech designs, easy to use and flexible were the main features to claim everyone’s attention. Today Teseo is a modern and dynamic company with an active and motivated sales and management team. Our Technical department have a passion for continuously improving and developing our existing range of products, forward thinking and striving to develop new ranges to meet our customers’ future needs and requirements.

Company description: Bussi Elettronica Indutriale is an Italian based company specialized in the manufacturing of Electronic Demagnetizers. Applications : Bearing manufacturers Demagnetizers for inner and outer rings, rollers, bearing seals and assembled bearings. In line demagnetizers with coils adapted to customer parts transfer systems by flexible chain or rolling channels. Off-line demagnetizers with conveyor belt and integrated coils. Automotive parts and components manufacturers Demagnetizers for components of various sizes and uses: the pieces can be demagnetized one at a time or in groups arranged in containers or boxes. The demagnetizers are usually off line, completely  automatic or with manual infeeding of the pieces into the coils. Depending on the application, the demagnetizers can be of the impulse type (capacitor discharge) or the direct current type.  Other applications Demagnetisers for tools and similar

Name: Elbo Controlli NIKKEN
Company description: Elbo Controlli Srl was founded by Danilo and Massimiliano Tasca in 1983 in Seregno, Italy. It was initially part of the Nuova Affilet Srl company which was owned by Danilo at the time. The main manufactured and marketed products in the 1980s and 1990s were optical scales and digital readouts. Presetter machines for measurements and tool inspection were introduced in the late 1980s. Today the Elbo Controlli NIKKEN digital read-out remains a versatile and easy to use product. ELBO CONTROLLI NIKKEN is one of the most respected and well-known manufacturers of electronic equipment for machine tools on a national and international level. We have been whole-heartedly in this business for over 35 years: passion for our work pushes us to develop original and technologically advanced solutions.

Company description: MicroStudio is a company located in Italy and highly active abroad with consolidated partners around the world. The company’s strength lies in the internal skills of its 30 highly qualified operators in the various technologies: optical, mechanical, electronic and software. Our mission is to create solutions for control and quality in the production of springs and small metal parts. We manufacture products and services based on advanced technologies that are easy to use, intuitive and within everyone’s reach. This has made MicroStudio a European leader, and not only for measurement and quality control of springs. Innovation For MicroStudio, innovation only means “avant garde” technical research. We are conscious there are big possibilities of improvement and for this reason we give a lot of importance to the combination of technologies such as vision system, mechanics, electronics and software. We invest in our Research and Development department (R&D) a big slice of the cake. This allows us to come up regularly with new solutions to improve the efficiency of the production and the permanent control of the springs. The calibration laboratory Our calibration laboratory can offer complete services for spring manufacturers and users. We have equipment for testing instruments and management of samples. The MicroStudio calibration laboratory technicians, other than calibrating the measurement systems, check all the sensitive aspects of the instrument; this is the only way to ensure total reliability and suitability for use of the tool.

Company description: La Distribution Service (http://dsrs.it) è un'azienda specializzata nella fornitura di servizi per le aziende operanti nel settore della GDO, dal iper/supermercato, al negozio di prossimità Inscindibile da sempre il rapporto con Studio RS, software house di proprietà dello stesso Bruno Bottai (presidente anche di D.S.), che ha sviluppato TauPOS, una soluzione completa frontend/backend, multi-piattaforma, centralizzata e scalabile per la gestione dei punti vendita L'azienda offre servizi a 360 gradi, avvalendosi di partnership consolidate negli anni con i maggiori fornitori hardware e del know-how maturato in oltre 30 anni di attività nel settore, a stretto contatto con le principali catene della grande distribuzione Nel dettaglio: - Fornitura hardware sistemi POS (Toshiba, Epson, NCR, Wincor Nixdorf, Ditron POS) - Soluzioni self-scanning, self-checkout, self-payment - Assistenza onsite, flotta e personale dislocato sul territorio per una copertura di Toscana, Liguria, Lazio, Sardegna, Isola d'Elba - Help-desk attivo 7 giorni su 7 - Soluzioni ed integrazioni software Software TAU POS Tau pos dialoga con qualsiasi gestionale, funziona su tutti i sistemi operativi e con tutte le piattaforme hardware Grazie al collegamento diretto con i servizi interbancari, TauPos consente di eseguire ogni tipo di transazione finanziaria, accettando qualsiasi forma di moneta elettronica e buoni pasto, o di effettuare cambi direttamente in cassa Il nostro sistema di fidelizzazione (Fidelity) consente la circolarità in real-time e la gestione di tutte le attività relative ai premi direttamente espletabili in cassa Grazie al modello di progettazione scelto, è possibile inoltre avere, sempre in cassa e sempre in tempo reale, il venduto o la situazione del magazzino La nostra offerta è rivolta alle aziende che operano nel mondo della distribuzione e che hanno necessità di razionalizzare la loro attività attraverso un moderno ed affidabile sistema di gestione del punto vendita

Company description: WHO WE ARE   AXOR, for more than 30 years has been one of the leading companies in the engineering, manufacturing and installation of equipment for the Food Industry. WHAT WE DO  AXOR engineers, manufactures and installs complete lines and machines for the production of Short-cut Pasta, Long-cut Pasta, Special Shapes Pasta, Couscous, Instant Pasta, Quick Cook Pasta, Asiatic Noodle, Gluten Free Pasta, Pellet and Snacks.   AXOR has installed over 150 lines and equipment all over the world, from Italy, all of Europe, North and South America, Africa, Asia and the Middle East.  MISSION, QUALITY AND TECHNOLOGY    We engineer and manufacture lines and machines that allow our customers to reach high quality and efficiency standards, ensuring a complete qualified technical support and pasta manufacturing assistance at any time and all over the world. Based in Como the company manages directly all the activities from product development and manufacturing to sales and service activities. Claind operates into different industry sectors: analytical laboratories, pharma, chemical, food, mellurgic, electronics. Operating in 32 countries, Claind is now consiodered as a global player in gas generation. At the heart of every corporate decision lies a commitment to customer satisfaction, fostering strong, long-term relationships built on trust—going far beyond mere technical and commercial interactions. Claind is also deeply focused on embracing the challenges and opportunities brought by market changes. Innovation is an integral part of its identity, with its products standing out for their design, reliability, and ease of use. A key strength of Claind is its ability to complement its products with a comprehensive offer of services, to support its clients in pre-sales and post-sales phases. The company combines a widespread global presence with high-quality local service. Where it does not have a direct presence, Claind operates through a carefully selected and continuously trained network of agencies and dealers. Thanks to its extensive experience and deep industry expertise, Claind is always looking ahead, setting ambitious goals for the future. The expansion of its commercial network and the continuous development of its product range will allow Claind to significantly strengthen its position in the global market in the near future.

Company description: METALPRES S.r.l. was founded by Michele Suppo and his brother Pierino in 1977. The company is leader in the field of die casting in alloy of aluminium and zinc and boasts more than 30 years of experience in the production and processing of medium and large set of products with high standard of quality. The company is able to satisfy production needs over 800 Tons of material, of components for the automotive, of industrial vehicles and security locks obtained with presses between 180 and 700 Tons. METALPRES S.r.l. has a 10.000 mq area, half of which covered TECHNICAL OFFICE The technical office is composed by highly qualified and specialized personnel with several years of experience in the sector. Thanks to 3D softwares of simulation and design the team is able to garantee an excellent customer care service, contribuiting in addiction to the design, the die and the tools project. COSTRUCTION MOULDS Mechanic’s equipment is formed with EDM, MILL work center CNC on horizontal grinding machines. With the software CAD-CAM various particulars (computer aided design and computer aided manufacturing) can be managed. DIE CASTING The raw material (aluminium’s alloy UNI EN 46000) is trasformed with melting furnace FERGAL 10000Kg. By lodles dagassed are feed maintenance’s load furnace of die-casting machine which ranging between 180 and 700 Ton. METALPRES S.r.l offords details with particular weights ranging between 4 and 3000gr. Details shearing are made by 15 hydraulic presses.

Company description: Nata nel marzo 1990 con l'acquisizione del know how, del marchio e dell'esperienza di Neohm Elettronica, presente sul mercato internazionale dell'elettronica dagli inizi degli anni Sessanta.  Questo acquisto è andato di pari passo con una forte azione di aggiornamento tecnologico ed un potenziamento ed arricchimento sia delle linee di produzione che delle strutture indirette idonee a garantire il continuo adeguamento alle esigenze del mercato.  A partire dal 2018 il nuovo assetto societario consolida l'azienda e, oggi, Alutron si occupa di progettazione, sviluppo, industrializzazione, produzione e vendita di componenti, schede e sistemi elettronici. Le approfondite conoscenze di progettazione hardware, software e del processo produttivo di prodotti e sofisticati sistemi elettronici consentono alla nostra società di finalizzare progetti e garantiscono ai partner il raggiungimento delle performance di processo e prodotto, indispensabili alla riuscita dei progetti.  I mercati principali di riferimento sono aerospazio, ferroviario, automotive ed elettronica industriale. Nel 2023, Neohm è stata acquisita da Alutron Srl, azienda che si occupa di design e produzione di rack e accessori meccanici per l'elettronica, diventando così la Divisione Elettronica di Alutron Srl - www.alutron.it.

Name: UFO - La Nebbia Che Ferma Il Ladro

Company description: 5 secondi - ZERO visibilità. I classici impianti d'allarme suonano ma non agiscono per fermare il ladro, UFO in pochissimi secondi crea un vero e proprio muro di nebbia che impedisce al ladro di vedere ed agire. UFO è il primo antifurto a nebbiogeno gestibile direttamente dal cliente finale.  Non necessita dell'intervento di un tecnico per l'installazione né per manutenzioni future. Grazie al suo design ed alla sua tecnologia UFO è in grado di proteggere l'ambiente in modo autonomo ed in caso di effrazione erogare in pochissimi secondi una fittissima coltre di nebbia, creando una vera e propria barriera tra le cose da rubare ed il malintenzionato! Finalmente un device che permette di non essere più dipendenti da installatori e manutentori, non dover più mettere sensori ovunque, non richiede interventi murari! Un semplice elettrodomestico in grado di difenderti da furti e rapine!

Company description: Fondata nel 1951, opera nel settore della progettazione e costruzione stampi per le materie plastiche e la gomma. Grazie ad un servizio efficiente, la puntualità negli impegni presi, la qualità ricercata in ogni dettaglio, la volontà di crescere nonostante le difficoltà, siamo fornitori di aziende leader nel settore dell’automotive e degli elettrodomestici. La progettazione, completamente autonoma, sviluppa e propone nuove soluzioni tecniche a problemi complessi, partendo dall’utilizzo e la funzionalità del pezzo richiesta dal cliente, studiamo lo stampo più adeguato a soddisfare tali requisiti iniziali che devono generare il risultato finale visibile nel  pezzo stampato. La programmazione delle lavorazioni come tutto lo sviluppo delle varie fasi di lavoro che sono necessarie al completamento dello stampo vengono gestite dall’ufficio Industrializzazione, quale motore propulsore di queste attività. L’officina si avvale delle più avanzate tecnologie, utilizzando nuovi centri di lavoro per fresatura ad alta velocità, costantemente tenuti sotto controllo come altrettanto vale per tutti gli altri macchinari, con lo scopo di garantire sempre la massima precisione meccanica nell’esecuzione della lavorazioni. Nel 2001 il sistema di gestione viene certificato ISO 9001 e nel 2003 viene ampliato anche per il reparto stampaggio.

Company description: GBC è un marchio commerciale con una lunga tradizione ed una solida esperienza. La sua storia inizia nell'ormai lontano 1958, anno nel quale Gian Bruto Castelfranchi fondò l'azienda con il preciso intento di conquistare il mercato. Giovane, ma saggia. Così potremmo definire Kon.El.Co. Spa. La storia della società, infatti, è recente, ma il bagaglio d'esperienza e di competenza che il team Kon.El.Co. è in grado di offrire connota questa realtà quale Distributore affidabile e di lunga tradizione commerciale. Fondata nel 1994, Kon.El.Co. si è rapidamente evoluta con l'acquisizione della concessione di noti marchi commerciali. Successivamente l'azienda è diventata una Spa e da allora ha conseguito risultati sempre più gratificanti che l'hanno resa, oggi, un leader nel mondo dell'elettronica. Il brand GBC accompagna da sempre il successo di Kon.El.Co. Spa, costituendo il più importante progetto commerciale della società. In un mercato globale, sempre più competitivo e selettivo, Kon.El.Co. Spa ha saputo distinguersi nel tempo quale Distributore qualificato di elettronica ed elettronica di consumo, conquistando la fiducia e la credibilità da parte delle aziende rappresentate e, soprattutto, da parte dei clienti. Oggi Kon.El.Co. Spa presidia il mercato con una rete capillare di negozi, per un totale di circa 550 realtà commerciali, tra distributori, grossisti e GBC Store, che rappresenta la concretizzazione del nostro importante progetto di Franchising.

Company description: Service, Ethics, Innovation and Technology are part of our DNA forever. Building systems that allow our customers to work with higher quality, high security, enhancing the processes we are involved in, is our goal for more than 38 years. Seit Electronics is a world leader in the production of laser machines and medium and high frequency induction generators. The company is located in Valdobbiadene, in the province of Treviso, a few kilometers from Vicenza and Venice. Starting from a small reality in 1979, it immediately became the reference point in the field of induction by operating in the eyewear, dental, orphan, and industry sectors and subsequently, since 2000, in the laser machines for the textile industry and footwear industry. Seit Electronics offers its machines for marking and laser cutting, welding and eyewear worldwide with a proven sales and service network and today, as of then, the production cycle takes place completely within the our company thanks to the research and development departments, electronics, mechanics and carpentry where the experience and the tenacity of our employees can best express the creativity and dedication to the work of our territory.

Company description: EUROMAR was established by Guido Malaterra in 1956 as customs broker and international freight forwarder and after some years a "IATA Cargo  Agent".    Today, EUROMAR G.M. Srl is an international freight forwarder skilled in the sectors of alternative energy, electronics, instrumentation, information technology, fashion, chemicals and pharmaceuticals, and though a member of various multinational organizations, still retains the personal style typical of medium-sized Italian companies.  The dual role of externational freight forwarding and customs operators allows us to handle all the formalities and customs related issues and to ensure a complete, highly qualified and specialized professional assistance. The Company is an IATA approved cargo agent, this allows the company to operate in managing shipments by air exto and out accordling to standard operating and safety IATA. Euromar is a company operating in the international freight forwarding sector that has developed highly specialist expertise over the years, and is today able to offer sophisticated services geared to specific product categories, as well as custom solutions for companies whose needs go beyond the simple transportation of goods.  Euromar G.M. it was one of the first Italian companies to obtain the ISO certification in 1998, and is currently DNV certified to the UNI EN ISO 9001:2008 standard and is certified AEOC from 2012.

Fornitrice ufficiale della Pubblica Amministrazione della Repubblica di Cuba, è inoltre una solida società di import-export, che svolge attività di fornitura di materiali elettrici, elettronici ed informatici e distribuzione di componenti meccanici e di sistemi di sicurezza civili ed industriali in Italia, Spagna, Germania, Bulgaria, Russia, Ucraina e in tutto il Latino-America. Dal 2009 entra nel campo dei toner creando la linea “Impresso”, con cartucce compatibili di altissima qualità per oltre cento modelli di stampanti e fotocopiatrici.  Il continuo miglioramento rappresenta la base culturale, intellettiva e motivazionale che caratterizza l’azienda stessa. La volontà (e la capacità) di sapersi mettere in gioco ad ogni livello è il requisito necessario per garantire prospettive di successo nei servizi al cliente, nella soddisfazione del personale e nel mantenimento di un livello competitivo oggi sempre più elevato. Il nostro obbiettivo è conquistare la fiducia dei clienti attraverso un impegno proficuo anche in termini di prezzo e qualità, il tutto con il supporto della necessaria esperienza tecnologica e commerciale.

Company description: Siamo specializzati nella produzione di etichette autoadesive e produciamo sleeve, stampati fino a 9 colori anche con lamina oro o argento il cui processo viene completato totalmente all’ interno della nostra Azienda offrendo tutto il know-how eventualmente richiesto per particolari applicazioni. Il controllo della produzione si svolge mediante adeguati strumenti elettronici: videocamere d’ispezione, spettrofotometri per il controllo del colore e scanner. Siamo certificati UNI EN ISO 9001:2015 e il nostro organico comprende 18 dipendenti. Consci dell’importanza di offrire una consulenza a 360 gradi, mettiamo a disposizione tutta la nostra esperienza e il nostro personale altamente qualificato per offrire un supporto tecnico in tutte le fasi dello sviluppo del prodotto. Il reparto produzione, con la collaborazione di 11 addetti, si avvale di macchine di ultima generazione, flexo fino a 9 colori e digitali a 6 colori, con le quali siamo attrezzati per soddisfare tutte le Vostre esigenze.  Oltre a stampe tradizionali con laminazione a caldo e a freddo, serigrafia e rilievo,  siamo in grado di effettuare anche lavorazioni speciali come lo scratch-off, il coupon, le etichette multipagina, la stampa sull’adesivo. Con la stampa digitale siamo poi in grado di gestire al meglio le piccole tirature e  realizzare prodotti con dati variabili.

Experience, capability to listen, steady know-how of synthetic fibers production, a spirit of innovation and solid technical background are the values making a difference when a customer decides to choose FARÈ as a partner for the design, costruction and commissioning of a staple fiber or spunbond, composite or meltblown plant. Part of FARÈ added value comes from the synergy with FIL.VA, a company characterized by the use of the most modern and sophisticated techniques of extrusion for the production of monofilaments of polyester, polypropylene, polyamide and other polymers and FARCON, a company producer of flat dies for the extrusion of plastic materials together with gear pumps, screen changers and co-extrusion blocks. Name: Lav.in Srl
HQ Location: Italy, Venezia, Concordia, 77 Via F.lli Cervi, 30023
Technologies: WordPress
Company description: Lav.in (Lavorazione Inox) è un'azienda che si occupa da oltre 15 anni di lavorazione dell'acciaio e della produzione di cappe da cucina e di elettrodomestici professionali. Ad oggi, i settori di punta dell'azienda sono la produzione di cappe aspiranti di design, sia a marchio proprietario che conto terzi, e una produzione di alto livello per la cantieristica navale. Fra gli altri prodotti vi sono varie tipologie di complementi d'arredo e gli abbattitori e frigoriferi per l'HORECA. La nostra azienda, con oltre 8000 mq di area produttiva (attualmente in fase di ulteriore espansione), concentra al proprio interno ognuna delle fasi di lavorazione del metallo, dalla progettazione al taglio, dalla piegatura alla punzonatura, sino alla coibentazione e all'assemblaggio. Ciò consente di controllare in tempo reale lo stadio di avanzamento del prodotto, garantendo una migliore qualità, sia a livello di prodotto finito che di semilavorato. Grazie ad una serie di investimenti negli impianti produttivi e nella formazione del personale, nonché all'implementazione delle certificazioni ISO 9001:2008 ed ISO 18001:2007, Lav.in è riuscita ad inserirsi con successo così nel mercato nazionale come in quello estero. È del giugno 2017 la presentazione della nuova serie di cappe aspiranti da cucina, nata dall'incontro fra la nostra lunga esperienza e la competenza di abili architetti e designer. Si tratta di nove diversi modelli dallo stile minimal ed elegante, contraddistinti dalla presenza di finiture personalizzabili in gres porcellanato e in cemento estetico ad alte prestazioni, quest'ultimo originale brevetto Lav.in.

For more than 40 years FIAM has been an example of Made in Italy excellence in the world.  Every table, mirror, console, chair and every other piece of furniture is entirely produced in Italy, certyfying high quality and tight control of the entire production chain. FIAM’s commitment is to create unic and state-of-the-art products combining business know how and creativity of world famous designers with whom it collaborates. Company description: W.T.M. Srl was founded in 1992 and manufactures complete lines for the production and insulation of electrical conductors and special machines for the wire and cable industry.  Working in the wire and cable market for more than twenty years, WTM has gained the reputation of specialist in designing, developing and manufacturing high performance machines such as concentric cable taping and spinning machines, single twist stranding equipment, cable thermal treatment systems, rewinding lines and special machines for specific applications. The business of WTM has its roots in the company "Officina Meccanica Antoniana", founded in 1958 and oriented to the production of mechanical precision components and mechanical parts for third parties. In this way, we are able to produce autonomously the major part of the mechanical parts of our machines, reducing the delivery times and guaranteeing high flexibility. For what concerns the electrical installation,we employ the best components available on the market.  For what concerns mechanics, electronics and applied technologies, our team of designer engineers can elaborate original, simple but functional solutions for satisfying Customers' requirements and solving the specific problems in the process of special cable production. The devotion to research and design, material selection, accurate manufacturing, assembly and testing, allows WTM machines to meet fully the requirements of the most important cable producers all over the world. The cables realized with WTM equipment comply with the strictest international rules, thanks to the high precision and flexibility of its machines, achieved with the big experience obtained through the development of hundreds of different applications.  Our commitment for the future lies in continuously improving the technology of our machines, integrating more and more the resistant mechanical structure with the most sophisticated and innovative electronic and information elements.

Company description: Engico, founded in 1990 and located in Lissone, 15 km north of Milan, is currently employing 25 people at its 2500 sqm factory and furthermore is outsourcing with a network of long proved relationship companies for the manufacturing of mechanical parts and supplying of electronic equipments. In 1994 the first multifunction folder-gluer was designed and produced to be combined to existing Printer Slotters, obtaining a multifunction flexo folder gluer (more than 50 modules installed) followed by the development of other machines, currently part of the company production range. In the year 2000 the first independent Slotter module was successfully produced. Till now 30 modules have been installed in line with existing Printer Slotters as well. In January 2001 the first complete multifunction bottom FFG 165x410, was produced by Engico and it is, nowadays, still good performing (till now 12 Printer Slotter RDC and complete FFG installed). In August 2010 the biggest and sturdiest Printer Slotter Rotary Die Cutter, known all around the world, 2.50 x 6.50 meters, was installed and commissioned at the plant of a German customer (max triple wall sheet processed capacity 2500x6500 mm - 15 mm thickness – 2.500 g/sqm) Dedicated in line Printer modules and Fan Fold endless carton stacker for corrugators are also part of our machinery production range. Faithfully following the company motto "Innovators not Imitators", in 2012 we've designed and produced Aqua 250, our first inkjet printer, based on the most advanced waterbased technology and 100% dedicated to direct printing on corrugated. Starting from early 2013, thanks to the industrial agreement with a qualified engineer, boasting a long-term experience in the rewinding equipments, Engico started the manufacturing of its own Automatic Single-Face Rewinder. Engico has its own technical department for design, research and development. It is not a simply machines suppliers but a really proactive solution partner.

Company description: Per te che sei andato oltre, e hai deciso di leggere le informazioni (è sempre adrenalinico fare quel che ci viene detto di non fare). Bene, vogliamo essere chiari e concisi. Noi siamo qui per lavorare per te, vogliamo evitarti quelle attività che non hai mai voglia di fare... ma purtroppo qualcuno lo deve fare!  Altrimenti a che serviamo noi? Questo non per dirti che siamo masochisti, ma è perché ci piace far sentire le persone soddisfatte, tranquille e a farle concentrare sul proprio lavoro😉 Siamo nati nel 1995...25 anni, ormai un quarto di secolo! Ci trovi nelle province di Milano, Monza e Pavia.  Principalmente siamo specializzati nella vendita e noleggio di fotocopiatrici, stampanti, multifunzioni (ormai nessuno più le chiama fotocopiatrici, o no?), computer, lavagne interattive… e molte altre cose che scoprirai, se lo vorrai, basta chiedere. Comunque, siamo Corporate Partner Ricoh, leader mondiale nel settore Office (solo il meglio). Il nostro punto di forza è l’assistenza tecnica, veloce e costante ogni volta che ne avrai bisogno (e dico sul serio!).  Ah, come dimenticarsi.. siamo molto attenti alla sostenibilità, ognuno di noi nel suo piccolo potrebbe fare la differenza. Puoi chiamarci Ecotec, il tuo miglior amico tecnico, e ci saremo sempre, promesso 👨👩 Buon lavoro… e mi raccomando occupati solo di quello ! 🚀 ECOTEC srl ☎️ 02 56814512 💌 contattaci@ecotecsrl.it 🔗 https://ecotecsrl.it

Company description: WHO IS AURIGA Founded in 1983, AURIGA is part of Virgilio Holding Spa Group whose first company, Prodotti Gianni S.r.l., was founded in 1948 by Dr. Virgilio Gianni. Since its origin, Prodotti Gianni S.r.l. is engaged in import and distribution of products for the pharmaceutical, food, cosmetic and scientific research. AURIGA operates on two main markets; Optics and Electronics. A technical and professional team dedicates itself with strong passion and experience to each of these sectors to ensure the Customer quality service and reliable products from primary brands of worldwide importance. OPTICS AURIGA, the most important Italian distributor of instrumentation for astronomical observation, sport & outdoor. Optical instruments coming from the most important and well-known manufacturers of telescopes, binoculars, spotting scopes, microscopes and related accessories. Among the main brands handled Celestron, Sky-Watcher, Unistellar, Kowa and accessories of Auriga brand. The distribution takes place through specialized and consumer channels with a network of agents and sales men. ELECTRONICS AURIGA, a reference for fans of TV Digital from 1990. AURIGA was the first company to sell in Italy a decoder for reception of TV via Satellite and has linked his name to big brands in the industry, exclusively distributed in Italy. Promax (instrumentation), DiProgress (decoder DVB-T2, Android Tv and tivùsat), Terra (amplification TV and SAT), GTSat (LNB quality and unique technology), Selfsat (Multiswitch Made in Germany and exclusive flat antenna) and Global Invacom (Optical fiber). AURIGA is certified supplier of all major TV and SAT Italian operators (Sky Italy, RAI, Mediaset, tivùsat) for both consumer products, with the distribution of Topfield decoder, and for products for home and professional installation, such as TERRA for centralized distribution, Hotel, Residence, Villages and collective structures.

Company description: Fondato a Pesaro nel 2010, Second Life Kitchen è un progetto innovativo sviluppato dall'esperienza di un team di esperti del settore dell'arredamento.  L’idea Second Life Kitchen anticipa il futuro: rinnovare la cucina – e non solo (armadi, archivi, mobili, etc.) – mantenendo la struttura di base e sostituendo ante, cerniere, accessori e tutte le parti parzialmente o completamente rovinate dall’invecchiamento o superate da un punto di vista tecnologico ed estetico. Il concetto del “donare una seconda vita” è, per Second Life Kitchen, la spinta più grande per la ricerca dell’eccellenza: immaginare modi nuovi di rendere uno spazio più splendido e vivibile, recuperando le importantissime risorse ambientali di cui sono fatte le cucine e i mobili, è il concetto chiave della filosofia aziendale.  Alla base del successo dell’attività, vi è la fusione tra l’esperienza dei migliori partner nella produzione di componenti della cucina ed elettrodomestici e la professionalità dei consulenti scelti: una perfetta unione che ha portato al consolidamento del marchio Second Life Kitchen a livello nazionale.

Company description: Founded in 1956, Pagani S.r.l. excels in manufacturing high quality aluminium moulds for diverse moulding technologies and multiple sectors. Pagani S.r.l. has been UNI EN ISO 9001 certified since 1999 for complying with the requirements of the Quality Management System standard. Pagani S.r.l. has always been known for its innovative approach in both processes and products. The constant quest for new and more efficient solutions made it possible for the company to offer the best products on the market which are of high quality, precision and accuracy. It is the company’s aim to satisfy the expectations of all its clientele. Therefore, the production chain of the moulds always starts from the fundamental CAD, and then using the CAM to maximize automation and performances of the multi-axes computer numerical control (CNC) machines all the way through the dimensional inspection performed through the coordinate measuring machine (CMM). Pagani S.r.l. is an ethical company which pays very close attention not only to the production processes but also to the working conditions of its employees. The company proudly highlights its special focus on sustainable growth based on the ecological paradigm, and because it also understands the importance of a healthy workplace environment, continues to develop a corporate welfare plan which benefits all its employees. The company has been supported by various suppliers and clients both in Italy and overseas. In fact, 40% of the company’s revenue derives from exports. Pagani S.r.l. reached a level of automation in 2018 which turned the company into Industry 4.0. The milling centres are now connected with the internal management software which consequently makes it possible to monitor and analyse the data collected directly from the machines. The final goal is to constantly improve the efficiency of products, processes and logistic supported by big data analytics and new technologies.

Company description: The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Meduna di Livenza (North East of Italy, 60 km far from Venice airport).  Its roots are firmly embedded in its knowledge and expertise of raw materials which are modelled and turned into shapes that are difficult to tame. In fact, the name Stilcurvi is a reference to these "curves" and the starting point of the company’s long history which has brought it to where it is today, with 170 employees and indoor production facilities covering around 70.000 square meters. In the Nineties the company expanded, supplying to its customers finished furnitures as well as wood accessories for the furniture industry. Thanks to the past 20 years' investments, today Stilcurvi's offer includes curved items for kitchens, bathrooms and bedrooms of any type, shape and finish (lacquered with polyurethanic lacquer, wrapped with PET/PVC foil or veneered), gloss/matt UV-painted panels and melamine faced chipboard/mdf frontals with(/without) integrated handle. Cutting-edge technologies combined with a strong workmanship enable Stilcurvi to deliver products of the highest standards, ensuring to its customers a thorough control over its manufacturing process as well as competitive prices. L'azienda è stata fondata nel 1986 e si trova a Meduna di Livenza (Tv): conta 170 dipendenti e si sviluppa su circa 70.000 mq di superficie coperta. Grazie agli investimenti degli ultimi 20 anni, oggi l'offerta di Stilcurvi comprende articoli curvi per cucine, bagni e camere di ogni tipo, forma e finitura (laccati con vernice poliuretanica, avvolti con foglie polimeriche o impiallacciati), pannelli verniciati lucido/opaco UV e pannelli in truciolare/mdf nobilitato anche con maniglia integrata. Tecnologie all'avanguardia combinate ad una spiccata abilità artigianale consentono a Stilcurvi di offrire prodotti di altissimo livello, garantendo ai propri clienti un controllo a 360° sul proprio processo produttivo ed allo stesso tempo prezzi competitivi.

Company description: AZIENDA   La Troll è nata nel 1994 grazie all’esperienza maturata negli anni dal titolare prima come responsabile del reparto elettronico e poi come consulente e progettista esterno di una nota azienda a livello internazionale. Nel corso degli anni l’azienda si è evoluta dando vita ad una struttura in grado di collaborare allo sviluppo dei prodotti dei clienti e di produrre in completa autonomia, in quanto   tutte le fasi della progettazione e produzione vengono svolte all’interno senza l’utilizzo di fornitori esterni.   TROLL offers its services to companies that operate in the various sectors of the electronics market including: industrial automation, informatics, telecommunications, electromedical, domotics, collective restoration and refrigeration. Troll was founded in 1994 thanks to the experience gained over the years by the owner first as head of the electronic department and then as a consultant and external designer of a well-known company at international level. Over the years the company has evolved to create a structure that can collaborate in the development of customers’ products and produce in complete autonomy, as all phases of design and production are carried out inside without the use of external suppliers. The company covers an area of about 7,000 square meters and it has been built with advanced technologies that can minimize energy consumption and eco-friendly materials with low environmental impact. The flexibility of production is the strength of the company. For reasons of privacy and in the sign of the utmost professionalism, Troll limits its partnership exclusively or at most to a few and selected customers for each production sector.

Nada 2008 Srl grazie alla ricerca ed alla stipula di accordi commerciali con le più prestigiose Case Produttrici, si propone oggi come un'importante realtà nazionale operante nel settore della Distribuzione che, con un rapporto diretto verso la Grande e Media Utenza, offre una gamma completa e qualificata di prodotti di Consumo, Cancelleria ed Accessori per il miglior uso ed esercizio dei Sistemi di Elaborazione Dati e dell'Informatica Distribuita.
